Title: room distinctly average

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: The hotel was modern!
Negative_reviews:
We were checked in to a room 1547 at 2pm and took our bags up to that room where there was no bed made up for our little boy even though it was meant to be a family room for three! We had tickets for the London eye so I thought I’d sort that out later when we got back! We then went out to explore London! We returned home after a long day at about 9.30pm and I checked with reception to see if the bed had been made! They said go up to your room and we will send housekeeping up with the bedding! We went up to room 1547 to find our keys didn’t work so rather than lug my 8 year old back downstairs my husband went down to tell reception! In the meantime housekeeping came to make up the bed! He used his key to get into room 1547 to find a man come to the door in his pants who said our luggage had been taken back down to concierge and this was now his room and his children were asleep! He said to me “you had Disney cases, they were taken back to concierge!” Julian the housekeeping manager heard all this and then took us back down to reception where another concierge man found our bags and said the guest in our room didn’t see our bags but he clearly had cos the guest told me I had Disney bags so he’d seen them! And we had valuables in the bags which if he wasn’t an honest person he could have taken our belongings including an iPad! 
We were now in reception with a very tired 8 year old with no room! The receptionist gave us a new room 1641 which we went all the way up to to find no bed for my little boy just a double bed and a table! This room was a smaller room than 1547 and no room to fit a bed! We rang down to reception to tell them and they kept saying we will send the bedding up! There was no bed to put the bedding on! Julian then arrived with said bedding and said he had no beds to fit in that room but he could squeeze a camp bed in! I went back down to reception to see if there was another room but they said they were fully booked!
Title: Terrible

Positive_reviews: Great location-comfortable accommodations- good bar/lounge with music
Negative_reviews: We booked a hotel room with breakfast but no matter what we said they refused to honor that part of reservation.Also, the first night we were there we went to have a drink in their rooftop bar but again we were not allowed in. A surcharge of 50 pounds per person per night was the fee for that.In total 500 for rooftop bar and 280 for breakfast equaling 780 in extras for a 5 night stay. Nice hotel but people need to be aware of extra charges that may occur.
Title: Pleasant

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: ABSOLUTELY NOTHING ALSO HAD TO BE EVACUATED WHEN FIRE ALARMS WENT OF JUST AS WE WERE QUEING FOR BREAKFAST
Negative_reviews:
THE TREATMENT WE GOT ON ARRIVAL WAS APPALLING AND THATS AN UNDERSTATEMENT, EMPLOYEE NAMED WAHJIT SENT US OFF LIKE CRIMINALS STATING WE WERE NOT VIP, ONLY TO FIND OUT THAT WE WERE ACCORDING TO THE SYSTEM. HE THEN PRETENDED TO UPGRADE US REALISING HIS UNPROFESSIONALISM.
WE ALSO HAD TO BE EVACUATED DUE TO FIRE ALARMS.
ON CHECKOUT ANOTHER MEMBER OF STAFF WAS EXTREMELY RUDE AND SENT US TO 2ND RECEPTION WHEN WE HAD STAYED AT "PLAZA BY THE RIVER" SAME AS WAHJIT HAD DONE. FUNNY HOW THEY LOOKED AT US AND SEGREGATED. MAKES YOU WONDER IF RACE HAD SOMETHING TO DO WITH IT AS OUR FRIENDS IN THE SAME GROUP WERE TREATED DIFFERENT AND YET I BOOKED ALL ROOMS.
WORST EXPERIENCE I HAVE EVER HAD IN MY ENTIRE LIFE AND ALSO HUMILIATED. THIS SHOULD NOT BE 4 STAR DEFINIETELY MINUS -3 STAR. SERIOUSLY THE STAFF NEED TRAINING OR BETTER JUST REPLACE THEM ALL WITH ONES WHO CAN ACCOMODATED GUESTS FROM EVERY RACE AND ETHNIC BACKGROUND. REALLY EXPENSIVE FOR NOTHING JUST THE OUTER BUILDING WAS THE NICE THING ABOUT THIS PARK PLAZA.
Title: WORST SERVICE AND THE MOST INCOMPETENT MEMBERS OF STAFF I HAVE EVER WITNESSED. VERY UNPROFESSIONAL

Title: Great, wouldn't book that hotel again though and probably not through you!

Positive_reviews: Great view of the river in the executive room
Negative_reviews: It was an anniversary for my partner and myself and I mentioned this to the hotel when booking and asked if they could make our stay special but nothing was done. There was no coffee or tea in the room. No robes towels or slippers. Stickers on the floor of the bathroom?? Looked like they had been there some time??  Dirty bed linen. The TV didn’t work either?? For £290 p/n I expected more and we left feeling very deflated and I wouldn’t have thought we’d stay there again!! This was our 3rd visit this year as well.
Title: Pleasant

Negative_reviews: I booked the hotel as it had a pool as I was bringing my daughter to London for a treat as she particularly wanted to stay at a hotel with a pool. When I checked in I was told the pool was not open that day, we had cone early to use the pool facilities and therefore were very disappointed. The staff did not apologise

Very disorganized and short of staff, not acceptable that an hotel like this one can not manage properly breakfast.

Positive_reviews: Location for my purposes

Breakfast was awful - massive long ques , the restaurant size was way too small for the size of the hotel

Title: Never again !

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: A convenient location.
Negative_reviews:
There was a strong, weird smell at the room, a good part of a mirror at the room was broken and missing leaving sharp edges in the room where I was staying with my kids. I informed the receptionist in the morning but nothing had changed when we returned in the evening. The room was pretty dirty especially the bathroom. 
Also - the queue to have a breakfast in the restaurant in the morning was way too long!
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: The location was convenient and the concierge was very helpful in answering questions and booking our tours.
Negative_reviews:
The room was not properly cleaned, where the previous occupants clothing was left in the bathroom and the closet. I asked the front desk to have the housekeeping clean it and again it was not taken care of. I had to call again and physically watch them remove the items. 
We also asked the concierge to book our taxi to the airport for our departure and when we came down to the lobby with our luggage, there was no record of a taxi request. Thankfully, the employee helping us with our luggage was able to get a taxi quickly for us.
Title: I expected better cleanliness and accommodation for the price i paid for the room.

Positive_reviews: The hotel is in a great location and the room was lovely

Negative_reviews: Room service was not good at all

Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: I do not really like this hotel in any points.It is not the hotel to stay for a good holiday İn London.
Negative_reviews: There were many things not to like this hotel; first it was not clean enough, and daily room service did not care to cleaning, even at the beginning the bathroom items werent full for basic things like handsoap, shampoo etc. Shower was broken. Aircondition wasnt heated the room. Desipite the asked for these The hotel recepcionist didnt solve the problem until the next day evening, the worst thing was Recepcionist didnt inform the other one for the problems and changed the room immediately, and the gym center and pool were just a joke which were my first demand to being  these in a hotel. And breakfast menu was unhealthy and venue was very dirty. They show me a table which was very dirty under and around. Actualy these are not food table, just little tables for living rooms.. and the location is not close to any tube and bus stop.. to walk to down town 15-20 minutes by walk
Title: Poor

Positive_reviews: The check-in desk took forever!  I was third in line.  The person who was checking us in had to check with someone to see if they were correct.  When we went to the room someone else luggage in it. It took quite a while for them to remove it.  We decided to have room service.  No one answered the phone. Neither did the concierge, front desk.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Nothing
Negative_reviews: Dirty room. Asked for vacuuming but no response. Father and daughter - two single beds pushed together with one headboard. Not appropriate.
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: Good location and convenient position for what we wanted to do.
Negative_reviews: The staff were unhelpful as many could not speak English and could not respond to simple queries. Our coffee machine was broken and took 2 days and 6 staff to sort it out. Quite noisy from other rooms. No door to the bathroom was unnerving to older companion. Decor is dark and lowly lit so difficult for older companion to move around. Facilities in room are controlled by electronic keypad and ok for younger people to master but older person struggled. I walked down the stairs one day and got chased by security guard asking what I was doing and should use the lift. I am scared of lifts and found this attitude intimidating. Will not stay here again.
Title: Pleasant

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: The location was close to a couple nice pubs we went for dinner & the door staff of the hotel were very friendly.
Negative_reviews:
The room was dirty & wasn't serviced on our second day even though we were out all day, they also didn't provide enough towels for the number of people we had. 
Our air conditioner leaked on the first night due to a blocked & dirty filter.
Title: Poor

Positive_reviews: It was ok.
Negative_reviews: I did not like the fact that I had to take breakast everyday that we were at the hotel. I told the front desk that we were leaving early on the last day and did not want breakfast as I would eat at the airport. There were no wash cloths in the bathroom and had to ask twice for them. There were trays and empty bottles in the hallway to our room. We had a good view of the river and I feel that we paid for it. We could smell cigarette smoke in our room and I complained and nothing was done. Not bad for a non smoking room. The housekeeping staff could have done a better job of cleaning up the crumbs that were on the floor. I got a bill for 3 breakfast days but only had the chance to eat 2. This seems to be a great way to keep your restaurant going.
Title: I expected more for the price we paid for the room.

Negative_reviews: Ongoing Noise from the room above like hammering, nailing...early in the morning.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: The 12th floor executive lounge was great
Negative_reviews: No outlook from the room and very dark sterile environment .
Title: Sterile but comfortable room

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with River View
Positive_reviews: The location
Negative_reviews:
When we checked in and entered the room, there was a fingernail on the carpet.
Also the dust was all over the TV table, coffee table. 
I had to ask them to clean the room again.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: The hotel is located along the river Thames and our room (River View Suite) had a fabulous view. There is a bus stop right in front of the hotel (Salamanca Street) and the bus #77 will take you towards Waterloo/London Eye. The nearest underground is 5mins away by bus. The staff were really nice and always helpful. One of their bell desk staff even helped us by taking our prams to our room etc. The nearest restaurants are 5mins away from the hotel.
Negative_reviews:
Very poor breakfast. Not many varieties. The sad part is they do not refill the items. You have to pay for the omelettes ! Most of the restaurants in the UK serve free omelettes during the breakfast. However, they serve fried eggs if you have the patience to wait. Keep in mind, you will have to stand in the queue if you arrive after 9am.
Housekeeping dept. is very reactive. You have to inform them every time when you want to change your bed sheets, pillow covers or blankets otherwise, you will end up sleeping in the same bedsheets for days.
Title: Little expensive, but ok to stay with the family

Positive_reviews: The space is good, location is great. Design and layout is modern and space conserving.
Negative_reviews: The staff was rude and unfriendly. It seems like the casual dressing that we were in did not help :) I’m guessing it’s all about what you wear in this place, not how much is in your pocket. We also had to pay extra for iconic view when we shouldn’t have to.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: Had 3 room changes as wasn't to spec or cleanliness our shower drains smelt sooo bad! Stayed here many times but after this I wouldn't be back check in was long waited around loads. Was all a shamballs
Title: Fair

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: Nothing that I can say appreciative about the hotel and management
Negative_reviews:
1)Pathetic breakfast arrangement with long queues and chaotic atmosphere. Poor service and no change to menu over 3 days. 
2)I complained about the service levels & cleanliness of rooms & bathroom but received poor responses from the management.Had a poor experience & an absolutely unacceptable hospitality standards.
Title: To sum up - disappointing service, hospitality and extremely poor management response.

Positive_reviews: Great location.  Easy walk along the river to all attractions.
Negative_reviews: Reception was not warm and welcoming.  We did not find one friendly staff member.  Not even welcomed when coming and going g from the hotel.  More like an office than a hotel. The room service arrived stone cold.  Would go somewhere else next time.
Title: Ordinary.

Positive_reviews:
The building
The design 
Use of Automation
Negative_reviews:
Cleanliness and housekeeping professionalism
Underground station distance
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Staff were helpful
Negative_reviews: Leaky loo, had to ask for toiletries, not enough water in room for two, swimming pool not available to use which was part of reason for booking hotel.
Title: Disappointing and has tainted the brand

Positive_reviews: Nothing , was the worst experience ever
Negative_reviews: Actually I book a double room than she gave me twin room ( room was dirty , no robes ) . I called about the awning pool and when I get there was closed . Was waiting in reception for almost 10 minutes . The staff doesn’t know what to do . Than changed the room so when the new room was even worst .
Title: Poor

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: Breakfast. Speed of response to issues
Negative_reviews: Rooms not prepped properly for our arrival, no bed linen, cups etc for all guests. Rooms were not clean enough. Cost of mini bar. Boxes of products in bathroom which were empty. Distance for tube station
Title: Didn’t meet expectations of star rating and price

Positive_reviews: As always a very good bar, lovely modern environment.
Negative_reviews:
Shower smelt of damp and drains  in room 714
Attempted to contact room service at midnight to advise of the stench but no answer so had to sleep in the room 
Also no answer from room service 
Usually an excellent place to stay but this time very disappointing.
Was offered no recompense when i complained at check out.
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: The Batman was the only friendly person who spoke to us
Negative_reviews: We didn’t check in until 5.30pm and they told us our rooms weren’t ready. We had told them we would be there at 5 so don’t know why they were not expecting us. We were then told we were upgraded due to the inconvenience. Not sure what the upgrade was. Our room over looked the train line and it was just a standard room. The only bonus was a free drink voucher. Our room was not cleaned regularly and we waited 3 days for toilet paper to be refilled. The staff were not friendly or welcoming or helpful.
Title: It was very very average and not value for money

Negative_reviews: Sorry to say that it was a noisy room. When I pointed it out as I checked out I was told that I will be put on the next floor up next time as that is quieter. It would have been nice to have been offered that choice as I arrived, not as I departed
Title: Ok

Positive_reviews: Comfy bed
Negative_reviews:
Broken glass outside the front door. Room had not been cleaned there were sunglasses and a  glass half full of drink on the sideboard 
There was a disturbing smell of excrement coming from the bath overflow and mold which you could smell when in the shower on the shower ceiling.
Title: Failed to meet my expectations

Positive_reviews: Nothing
Negative_reviews: Everything I asked for room service takes 40 mins to even get a menu to order something, go down to the pool 7pm thought I’d wait till 8pm when I was told that children wouldn’t be in the pool, I go to reception now 8:55-9:45pm to say you know I have waited to have a swim with my husband but children are in the pool to be told oh yes we have extended times because we have loads of children in house, oh brilliant so no one tell the adults that want to swim without children no message by the pool nothing, last day get locked out of my room at 9am because the card didn’t work to get back in when I had come back from the pool there was sick by the lift!! Disgusting!!
Title: Sick by the lifts!!

Positive_reviews: The lobby was clean and smaller very nicely. The check in and out was fairly quick. The rooms were decently sized.
Negative_reviews: The cleaning process included making of the beds and getting new towels. The floors weren’t swept or vacuumed. The room service from the night before wasn’t taken out during cleaning of the room. The location was nice as it was on the water and close to some of the attractions: London Eye and Westminster. However, it was lacking in restaurants and cafes which made it difficult to search for places after a long day of sightseeing. During a late night attempt to go to the hotel restaurant- chino Latino- we were told we cannot order what we wanted, that we had to choose a pre fixed food option even though the place was empty. My parents ordered room service and no one called them back to say they had to use the late menu so would never receive the order anyway. They ordered from the late menu and were charged for both orders the following day - including the one they never received.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Comfy beds. Great shower and en-suite facities. Air con.
Negative_reviews: Although a pre payment authorisation was made the fridge would not open. On the first evening of our stay we could not buy any water as it was after 11. We had a late check in due to our flight. We reported the problem by going down to reception as no one was answering the phone. We tried room service but could not get a reply. Eventually on the 4 th evening after reporting it again a person came up and opened the fridge with a master key in two seconds. When the room was made up each day, indicated by the panel next to the door, used mugs were not washed which I would have expected and sugar was not replaced on the hospitality tray so I bought my own from a grocery shop. Takes the edge of staying somewhere reputable.
Title: Ok stay.

Positive_reviews: Convenient location for what we wanted, ice machine on each floor
Negative_reviews: Long wait for breakfast, cold food, not as clean as previous visits
Title: Pleasant

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: Well looked after hotel, clean rooms, friendly staff,
Negative_reviews: I payed for an executive double room with a sofa bed and more, arrived in my room and it was identical to the superior double room I previously stayed in. I stayed in an executive room in the past and it was a bigger room with a sofa, something the room I payed for did not have. I spoke to staff who said they would contact me about moving rooms but I never heard from anyone and nothing changed. Wish I did not spend as much as I did for something I could have got for a lot cheaper elsewhere. Disappointed.
Title: Not what I payed for, staff did nothing ☹️

Positive_reviews: Location is good.
Negative_reviews:
Dirty.
Had a cup of tea on 1st night. Stayed 3 night.
Room was tidied every day. However dirty cup and tea bag wasn't touched.
Toilet dirty.
In all very poor cleanliness.
Hotel is just a cash cow. Low paid staff and Poor standards. You pay peanuts you get monkeys.
Title: Poor

Positive_reviews: Closeness to attractions
Negative_reviews: Food - waiting around - hustle and bustle
Title: Great location - Poor attention to breakfast and booking in

Positive_reviews: Initial impression was good
Negative_reviews:
The fact that myself and 14yr old child were moved rooms three times due to technology issues and uncleanliness, the reception staff were not remotely helpful and didn’t even show us our room when we were relocated for the second time, the second room the fridge was full
of old food and spilt old milk. We had still not been relocated to our final room at 11pm bearing in mind we started having the issues at 9am.
I was ensured this morning that due to a technical failure I wasn’t able to have my account credited with the £50 the hotel removed from my card incase I used the mini bar (I didn’t) but would both have the refund and an email to confirm this today by the manager, I’ve yet to receive said refund nor have I been contacted by the hotel. I’m very unsatisfied and quite frankly cross that so little consideration or remorse has been offered. Very poor customer service.
Title: Won’t be booking this hotel again.

Positive_reviews: Site
Negative_reviews: Poor maintenance
Title: Park plaza London Riverbank

Negative_reviews: No blankets for bed.quilt too hot.  Poor checkin and wait for breakfast
Title: Fair

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: Front office staff are very helpful and friendly
Negative_reviews: The clean services at the room very badly
Title: Good

Positive_reviews:
+ big room,
+ great location (near city centre)
+ electronic controls for lights,
+ WiFi.
Negative_reviews:
- dirty forks, dirty plates, dirty knives for breakfast, I had to change it on my own just every day.
- dirty glasses in the room,
- hairs in the bathroom (and in the bath!),
- staff (on breakfast) never smiles,
- very busy breakfast, always you have to wait for a table,
- hotel does not react on emails and messages on booking.com (no reaction after several reminders),
- it is really GREAT that you have a fridge in the room, but you cannot use it for your own purposes (to cool water, sandwich etc.) because it has sensors (if you move smth, it will be charged),
- broken furniture: they have MENUS (booklets) under the tables for balance and stability! such a shame,
- problems with charges, system and staff (I paid for breakfast in addition on check-in, but on breakfast, they told me twice (or three times) I did not have breakfast and if I would pay it. They found the mistake in the system, but no apologies).
Title: NEVER again

Negative_reviews: Terrible cleaning of rooms! Never seen such lack of cleanliness in a big hotel like Park Plaza.
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Great location.
Negative_reviews: Nice hotel but the cleaning staff and staff coordination in general was lacking.  Our room was never cleaned properly in 6 days.  Dirty dishes, cleaning sponges and tissues left behind.  ugh.
Title: great location

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with River View
Positive_reviews: View from the room, toiletries when they were provided.
Negative_reviews:
The hotel is generally dark in its decor. Book in wasn't smooth as receptionist said she had to " aplogise " as the room we were to have had been given to someone else. I never actually knew which exact room I was to have. So confused big time.
Breakfast gets busy , but hot food was cold every morning. Only one coffe machine!
Toiletries were not replaced daily nor was tea. Also had to ask for new kettle and the light in the wardrobe didn't work. All was resolved quickly, but there does seem to be little attention to detail which makes the difference when one is staying in a fairly expensive hotel. Only one bath robe in room despite two of us in one room. I guess we were meant to share. 
The doormen and bar staff were fantastic at all times, friendly and very helpful.
Title: It could have been better

Positive_reviews: Just the location
Negative_reviews: Bathroom where bad  really un healthy .. un safe I got allergies since first dAte and took them two dates to switch me to another room
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Good breakfast but always a queue.
Negative_reviews: Not able to check in until 1600 hours and our friends couldn't check in until nearly 1700 hours. The hotel was booked for it's location and swimming pool but we could only use the pool once because other times it was closed for maintenance,
Title: Dissapointing

Positive_reviews: View from room and location were great, staff at breakfast were helpful as my daughter has a bit allergy, although there were not many options for her to eat.
Negative_reviews: The pull out sofa bed for the children in the living room was awful, it was so uncomfortable and you could feel every spring in the mattress. We asked for an extra duvet to put underneath them but it was still pretty awful. Had to ask for more pillows as there was 1 on the bed. The sofa and chairs also had rips in them. There were not enough hangers in the wardrobes for us all.
Title: Nice hotel but not worth the money

Positive_reviews: Location was good.
Negative_reviews: Very noisy room. Breakfast was an additional charge and very expensive. Long que for checkout. Silly sliding doors in the bathroom.
Title: Wouldn’t use this hotel again

Negative_reviews: RESTAURANT WAS EXPENSIVE AND RUBBISH.CHAIRS VERY UNCOMFORTABLE.
Title: GOOD LOCATION.

Positive_reviews: Location
Negative_reviews: Double charged for my room. Slow to reply to emails and generally slow in all things done. Had to wait until 1040pm to receive my extra bed in room, this after they charged me £30 to upgrade because my previous room was apparently not big enough for the extra bed despite them confirming on booking it would be done. Very poor customer service.
Title: Okay

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: The location, on trend!
Negative_reviews: The slowness of response
Title: hotel was ok but overall probably wouldn’t stay again

Positive_reviews: Location is good if upstairs but do not like to wait ten plus mins in a long line to sit down and then a long wait for coffee/tea and even longer if you order the eggs they offer you!   Food was fine and choice was fine.
Negative_reviews: Not waiting !
Title: Great location and decent hotel - rooms are fine - like the mood lights and decent bathrooms.

Positive_reviews: The location, the bed linen, the comfort of the bed.
Negative_reviews:
This was our 5th time at PPR. We were disappointed with our stay.
For an executive deluxe room we did not think it was up to description, there were no dressing gowns on arrival, the minibar was not restocked, when asked for dressing gowns got extra hangers left on the bed instead also the view was non existent. We paid more for this stay than previous ones but felt we had better rooms and service on our other stays.
Title: Dissatisfied and know you can do better.

Positive_reviews:
Quality hotel on the quieter side of London. Less food options in the area but still good enough. 
Great customer service from all staff that we had interactions with!!
Negative_reviews:
Our room was right next to the hotel restaurant which meant a lot of noise throughout the evening until around 1am. Lots of banging. Just luck of the draw which room you get. We just got unlucky
Our room had a bad smell from the drain in the bathroom when the water sits. Mentioned it to reception in the morning, came back that night from exploring and the smell was still there. We were checking out the following morning so didn't follow up.
Title: Just a hotel

Positive_reviews:
Location.
accessability.
cleanliness
Negative_reviews:
Service and Price.
when originally booked and confirmed over the phone, i was advised room location was river view, but on arrival i had to buy upgrade of £150
Not a happy Camper.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: Some of the staff were very supportive and cooperative
Negative_reviews: Housekeeping is very poor irrespective of several reminders to the management. Poor response to to the requests whenever we request for a service
Title: Poor housekeeping & Responses

Positive_reviews:
Room was spacious and comfortable.
Well serviced/cleaned while I was absent.
Negative_reviews:
On many occasions I had to request a dressing gown as one was not provided in my room. 
The buffet breakfast was well below average. The food  was flavorless and of poor quality in product itself and cooking of same.
Title: Great location and staff were accommodating.

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Negative_reviews: Check in was no good. Elevators are crowded. Staff morale is low.
Title: Would not return.

Positive_reviews: It is a good location.
Negative_reviews: Although the hotel itself is beautiful, the attitude of the staff changed when they saw the booking reference. We had problems registering, they tried to charge me for a third room. We found The swimming pool, no thanks to them.  Allegedly superior twin rooms that looked at walls, What was really disappointing was that we could have had free film and pizza nights, but they had forgotten to give us the welcome letter, along with the bath robes they forgot about. They failed to top up the tea and coffee. It is obvious they use these bookings as easy money. It costs them nothing, as they just happen to forget to tell you about the extras you could enjoy. Will not go back to this hotel again  also doubt if I would use booking.com again. There is no deal. You do not get anything other than a bed.
Title: Not made welcome.

Positive_reviews: Location good, clean room and bathroom.
Negative_reviews: Booked a twin room to find beds next to each other, looked like a double.  Queried at reception to be told the beds should have been seperated and the bedside table placed between them.  This was done however care had to be taken not to bang your head on the writing table as this overhung on one side of one of the beds.

Positive_reviews: Location

Room was in need of maintenance should have complained more as not worth the money...

Title: Pleasant

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed

Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews:
The position is handy to a lot of attractions.  Short walk across a bridge for Big Ben - although most is covered at the moment for renovation until 2021. 
Beds and pillows were comfortable. Room very quiet.
Negative_reviews: House keeping. I contacted the manager of guest services and by the tone of his voice I could tell he wasn't interested. My concerns were obviously addressed to the house keeper with little effect - about the only change was to come back for 2 days to find our room left unlocked. I have stayed in many hotels around the world and this is the only time I have ever had my room left unlocked.
Title: Close to attractions, comfortable beds, worst housekeeping I have ever experienced.

Toilet inside wasn’t cleaned thoroughly and had to ask for additional toilet tissue daily.

Title: Very comfortable just a little noisy at night.

Positive_reviews: Absolutely NOTHING
Negative_reviews: Over priced, worse than travel lodge hotel. It hasn't got enough cleaning staff, no one listens to you. They have too much client turn over to worry about individuals. We traveled 12 hours, arrived after 1400, but the suites were not ready for 3 more hours, hastily semi cleaned. They have exorbitant prices, try to take large deposits, throw people out (on check out days you will see house keeping for the first time every 20 minutes asking you 'are you leaving'. The key cards will strategically stop working on the departure morning, no one will clean your room in your stay. The accommodation is very small with deceptive pictures. The swimming pool is very small and has to be booked days in advance. There is no plus point in this hotel at all
Title: Please dont waste your money, comfort and precious time on this run for profit terribly kept hotel

Positive_reviews: Great location.
Negative_reviews: Room did not have the minibar stocked with any drinks, staff walked into the room without knocking, told at 12:30 to leave bar and to go to lobby where we could order drinks so we left and went to the lobby only to be told by reception we could not order any more drinks. If we had been given the facts correctly earlier we would have gone else where although why a London hotel with guests ordering drinks closes on a Friday night at 12.30 is beyond me

Title: Not again

Positive_reviews: Room lightening control system
Negative_reviews: 3 months back, I have requested the room to be away from elevator and they put me in a room in front of the elevator . Unfortunately, I have asked the front desk upon arrival, is my room is away from the elevator and their answer was, yes definitely. After that, I felt that I am not respected gust.
Title: commitment is questionable

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: Breakfast was fine
Negative_reviews:
We booked a family room. The room was tiny - when the sofa bed was out there was literally no room for anything else. Much worse, It took until nearly 10pm to get sheets and pillows for the sofa bed so our very tired children could go to sleep. A a result we all got a bad nights sleep.
Also, there are not enough lifts. It took 20 mins to get from the 14th to the ground on one occasion.
Title: Very disappointing

Positive_reviews: Otherwise, room was spacious, clean and it was peaceful. Pros and cons!
Negative_reviews: The hi-tech remote for the room took a while to get used to using. I was disappointed with the ac in the room. I wanted the room cold but it didn't seem to be working.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews:
We didn't book breakfast , because on a previous visit (9 months ago , we thought it very poor) .
I'm guessing this hotel has staffing issues and struggles at peak times. On checking in , which took a while, we were offered discount vouchers for not having our room cleaned or serviced (not sure which) , but we weren't impressed with that idea
Negative_reviews: the views of westminster are terrific.
Title: newish hotel in great location , but doesn't seem to respect its 4 star billing

Negative_reviews:
terrible breakfast - stone cold food, over-crowded dining room, no service, tables not clean.
Mold in shower cubicle, curtain hanging down, carpet not clean
Title: Would not stay here again. For the price I expect much better - overall poor.

Positive_reviews: Loved the view from the room as we booked executive room. The meal was lovely
Negative_reviews: When we arrived at 2.20pm our room wasn’t ready despite it says that entry is from 2pm! The receptionist asked us to come back at 3pm as the housekeeping was still cleaning our room. When we got in the room the cleanliness was very doubtful. There was a chewing gum left in the bath on the soap disposal there was black hair left on the puff and I found hair in the fridge. As you can image my first and last time at that hotel
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: Breakfast staff were pleasant and polite however the food selection was average at best. Staff throughout the hotel were unhelpful.
Negative_reviews: Room cleaning service was exceptionally late on the first day and on my second day the room was not serviced at all despite the room being vacant all day. When I reported it to the manager at 11.30pm he was completely uninterested and unhelpful.
Title: Very disappointed! Will definitely not be back.

Positive_reviews: The location
Negative_reviews: Housekeeping and reception staff were useless, room wasn’t cleaned for the duration of our stay, we had to collect towels at 12.15am because our room still hadn’t been made up since we left at 3pm in the afternoon. Very disappointed with the service for the amount we paid for it.
Title: Wouldn’t stay again

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: The location was pretty good.  Within easy walking distance to the London Eye, restaurants, and other attractions.  One of our kids got sick in the room and the cleaning staff were very helpful.  The concierge was also helpful; made some very good recommendations.
Negative_reviews:
Our check-in process was terrible.  We were given the wrong room, twice!  I had to return to reception two times until we finally got the room we paid for (1 bed with pull-out sofa couch).  After the 45 minute ordeal, the front staff were fairly nonchalant about the run-around.  They gave a half-hearted apology, but by then I was over the whole situation.  It was an overall very weird experience. I've never been treated so poorly at a hotel at check-in.  
Also, we ordered room service, and surprise, they got my order wrong.  And lastly, as we stored the sofa bed, there was trash, to include an actual chicken bone from someone's dinner, under the couch.
Title: Based on the terrible check-in process, attitude of some of the staff, I would not stay here again.

Positive_reviews: The location and price if I had been charged according to the booking price.
Negative_reviews: There was mold in the shower on the ceiling and all along the grout. The hotel overcharged my credit card after checkout, attempted to correct by charging me again for a higher amount. I am yet to receive a response from the hotel. Not happy!
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Nothing
Negative_reviews: Bad customer service. I also informed them in advance that I booked for our first marriage anniversary but they did nothing for this.
Title: Bad customer service to a 5 star hotel.

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with River View
Positive_reviews: The bar was vert nice, the view also
Negative_reviews:
The rooms were not clean as expected
the towels weren't changed  - taken more than 1h to receive them
Only 2 elevators for 500 rooms (more than 10min on mornings)
Very poor experience at the check-out.
at less 10 min from the closest tube
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Room was okay
Negative_reviews: We had made a block booking of three months ahead for a group of 10 to get a good rate at the hotel charged several of my friends the full rack rate for that day
Title: Hotel refused to honour booked rate

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: The location is good. Concerning the breakfast, they offered us the only option to pay for the whole stay (even considering the fact that we were leaving before the beginning of the last breakfast) or not to have breakfast.
Negative_reviews: The cleaning is far away from the desired. The windows cannot be opened and there is no fresh air. We were offered with a room which view is entirely the façade of the neighbouring building (at appr. 3 m distance). The sink was clogged and they didn't do anything even after our complain.
Title: Good location but I will never use this hotel.

Positive_reviews: Can not believe that the shower room very dirty.
Negative_reviews: The drinking water and coffee capsules gave only the first day ????
Title: Poor

Positive_reviews: The location on the riverside; modern rooms, lovely big comfy bed, good breakfast ,pleasant communal areas
Negative_reviews: Issues with room on arrival, cleanliness of areas of the room, attitude of cleaning staff, poor tv reception; shower heads need attention to give acceptable water pressure
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: We liked the staff who were super friendly
Negative_reviews:
After a very long flight we just needed a cup of tea, shower and bed.we weren’t told about the kick on the fridge and needing a bond on it to unlock it. When we went down to pay it it took them another 4 hours to unlock it and then found we had no milk and all that was in fridge was 1 can of red bull, 1bottle Diet Coke and a tube of chocolates. There was also no soap in the bathroom. After the servicing the next day we found the cleaner had left no teaspoons. 
The shower didn’t look as if it had been scrubbed
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: The hotel itself was comfy, the room service was adequate although the food arrived cold, the facilities decent and the location acceptable for someone who works across the river.
Negative_reviews:
The staff in the bar were awful, asking me to move to a side table by the wall, just because I wasn't eating brunch, despite there only beign 4 other people in the entire room who weren't working there. I found their "European" attitude really bad towards the English guests.  Especially as we are in London not bloody Europe.  they happily stood around  chatting to themselves rather than look up from there phones.The room service was bad, I had to send back a COLD burger and fries and the general disdain was really unacceptable.
As  a frequent guest of the Plaza chain, I will think twice about staying at any of them locations again
Title: Bad stay at the Plaza on the Riverbank

Positive_reviews: Nice location although in a busy therefore noisy area, lovely view on the River Tames, welcoming staff and large and comfortable room
Negative_reviews: Problem with the bill as room price changes everyday according to hotel occupancy, never saw that before London but a nasty bill instead of planned booking price. Breakfast not so great quality wise, a lot to choose from but chemical juice instead of fresh, limited fruit choice, average quality for croissants and cakes
Title: Good service and location, friendly staff but poor quality price ratio (London is an expensive city)

Positive_reviews: The hotel is in a good location, but our room was a big dissapointment! Shower door leaked,toilet didn’t flush properly, bed was hard & we had to ask for firm pillows as all 4 on the bed were soft! We stayed 2 nights at this same hotel at beginning of May & totally different standard of room!
Negative_reviews: The room was not good & the restaurant is “a little bit of food on a big plate” & too upmarket!
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Location and comfort. Reception very welcoming.
Negative_reviews: One doorman was extremely rude saying it was our fault a door handle fell on my partner when we tried to open it. Said we should have used the disabled button.
Title: Was only one night but enjoyed our stay

Negative_reviews: There is no doors in the toilet and there is no window you can open in the room so the room smell and you can do nothing about it. The room was not clean.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: it was OK.
Negative_reviews:
I will never return to this hotel the bar manager is a racist. I went with my son to have a drink in the 1st floor bar
the manager didn't let us to sit on the table we wanted by the window his reason was that this section is closed
and wehen we said very calmly that this doesn't make sence he said that he refuses to serve us because we 
questioned him. As the guest of the hotel we were refused to be serve only because we have a middle eastern
look and we were not wearing a tie. Shame.
Title: terrible

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews:
Great location
Great style to the hotel and rooms
Good manager on the day who resolved a room issue for us very efficiently 
Impressive view when you could see it
Good facilities (if lacking in the cleanliness department)
Negative_reviews:
Original room had sewage smell and a terrible view, the 2nd room was better but again not a great view
It was a mixed bagged with the staff, the Manager on the day was great and resolved our room issue satisfactorily. As were the were the staff at the pool. The rest however were very surly and not welcoming at all, especially the bartenders in the Chinco bar, it was a chore to order a drink from them to a point where they were close to being described as hostile. 
The room views were not great from either room as i specifically requested a river view many weeks back.
The cleanliness also could of been better, from the sewage smell of the original room to the dirty pool side and changing room areas.
Title: Great spot and potential, marred by smalls niggles which you don't expect from a Park Plaza

Positive_reviews: We ordered a room with two beds. And when we arrived it was a big double bed. Also everything was dirty. And when we called the superviser, she didn't even say sorry. Only told us to call the cleaning service. I was very disappointed since it's a 4 star hotel.
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: Location and rooms
Negative_reviews: Room and location great breakfast was a joke 20minute queue and then sat on the lap of the table next to us. Too close and too many people trying to eat in too small a restaurant.
Title: Pleasant

Negative_reviews: Cleanliness was poor - sadly moved from first room as not clean , then second room equally poor - was given access to executive lounge as apology but that was fairly poor too (though spectacular views) stairwell was also unclean - rotten food etc had obviously been there a while - if residents have access to stairwell (for those who don’t use the lift ) then maybe cleaning it would be prudent
Title: Disappointing

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with River View
Positive_reviews: Location, size and layout of the room and view were good.
Negative_reviews: Oh, where to start? We arrived at 2pm, but the room wasn't ready. However, we were offered a voucher for the hotel bar. When we came back from our schedule for that day at 11pm and got to the room, it clearly wasn't vacuumed. We told staff directly then and again after breakfast the next morning, but in the afternoon, the same dirt (there was a red heart-shaped sequin) had only been moved around in the room. Also, they had removed our used towels but only replaced one of them. Beauty products weren't stocked up, used water glasses weren't replaced. The elevators are a disaster, there are only two of them and it takes ages for them to arrive and then again ages to get to the desired floor. Breakfast is to be taken in the bar at very low tables, and the range and quality is the poorest I have encountered so far. There was a bowl with grapefruit segments which were hardly recognisable as grapefruit, it was only a gooey mass. The air-conditioning in the room blows down straight onto the face, so we had to have it switched off at night. You can hear a lot of noise from the street although we were high up and it should be soundproof.
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: Rooms were very clean . Beds fairly comfortable.
Negative_reviews: Only one robe provided for a room of two. Air con not great. Bit too far out of central attractions
Title: Fine - a lot of money for the location

Positive_reviews: The room was comfortable and security were helpful and courteous.
Negative_reviews: It took over 30 mins to check in. We were then moved to another building and told it was an "Upgrade". As a frequent traveller this was not tbe case. If they would have taken to time to view my profile it would have been clear I have stayed a number of times at the hotel.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: I went for breakfast on the first morning of my stay only to be met by a tour group of approximately 50 people who were completely blocking all access to the food and eventually I had to leave (without breakfast) as I was going to miss my bus. ALL guests should have been accommodated with breakfast. As a result of this I decided to order breakfast to my room on the second morning and duly filled out my breakfast card and left on my door handle the previous evening to be collected. When I opened my door on the second morning to see if anyone was on the way with my breakfast lo and behold my card was still on my door handle and had not been collected by anyone! This is not good enough.
Negative_reviews: The staff at reception and concierge desks seem to have serious difficulty understanding simple instructions in plain English. I ordered a car transfer through the hotel for Heathrow Airport on my final day and when I asked the front desk if my car was outside at the allotted time your employee checked outside and told me that it was not. He then rang the car company who told him that the car was in fact waiting outside the hotel. The driver of said car then came to the front desk and reminded your employee that only 15 minutes beforehand he had approached him and made his presence known! How could your employee have forgotten this in such a short space of time.
Title: WAY over-priced for the quality of service provided

Positive_reviews: Choice of breakfast was limited and when omelette requested we were told this was an additional charge! Boiled eggs were cold
Negative_reviews: Overall Service was poor and not very welcoming
Title: Good location but would not choose to stay here again

Positive_reviews: Room was nice bed was comfortable nice selection for breakfast
Negative_reviews: The view of a train track !! At no point do they tell you when booking that you have to pay an extra £70 when there to get the themes view ! And receptionist was rude when I questioned this !
Title: Not all it’s cracked up to be !!

Positive_reviews: Very central location. Drop off and reception area is quite spacious and well laid out. Swimming Pool and Spa on the first floor. Great Room service. Nice bathroom in the accommodation. Wide screen TV - 65".
Negative_reviews: TV with Program and Channels guide is quite a bit confusing and not user friendly. I still can't work out the usefulness of the keyboard which is placed on the table in front of the TV. Could do with a wider  choice of TV Stations. The whole furnishing and decorating theme is quite dark and black. I much prefer lighter colors as these are more relaxing and help for a more comfortable stay. Reception staff are not always friendly and receptive.
Title: Met my purpose. Very ideal location.

Positive_reviews: The pool.
Negative_reviews: To far away from the city and the bar staff need to get a personality had one drink and left, they were more welcoming than a dose of the plague.and no lager on tap as the gas had gone. At breakfast it was organised chaos...I wouldn't even pay £50 per night to stay there, much better and friendlier hotels closer to the city with the same price, bit sad really.
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: The location was good but that was about it. A horrible experience overall.
Negative_reviews:
The staff were rude when they weren’t ignoring you. They didn’t properly clean the room and left dirty cups lying uncleaned. The concierge did not offer any help with luggage and we were challenged when we arrived back from a show despite other members of the public arriving at the same time. Why we were targeted like that is beyond me and particularly annoying given the two times we attempted to use the bar, we were completely ignored and just left without being served. Just overall a really bad experience and I wouldn’t recommend this hotel
Unless you didn’t care about room hygiene and looked like you had money.
Title: Poor

Positive_reviews: It is in a great location close to everything you need
Negative_reviews: The shower head was broke the toilet flushed was broke the room was dusty every were not been cleaned properly
Title: Great location not great hotel room

Positive_reviews: Rooms were clean and a good size. The beds were very comfortable
Negative_reviews: The property was very overpriced for what you got. There was no milk in out room and the fridge would not open. The reception staff seemed more interested in fixing each other hair than serving guests. Won’t return in a hurry.
Title: Not what I expect

Negative_reviews: Didn’t have my booking, room was ugly and couldn’t see the telly from the bed, curtains had holes in them,
Title: Rubbish.

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with River View
Positive_reviews:
Utsikten var det enda
Only plus for the view
Negative_reviews:
Dålig service på allt
Bad service
Salim the manager from France promised me compensation of my lost belongings but he did not send me money back.
Title: Very Poor

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: The concierge
Negative_reviews:
Not told the need to pre- book the bar on Saturday night! Told no room at 7pm. Very poor that no space for guests in hotel.
Poor quality cooked breakfast
Title: Ok but been in much better for same value or less in London

Positive_reviews: Bed was comfy
Negative_reviews: We booked and paid a month before arriving at the hotel and were still made to wait over an hour for our room. Check in was at 2 and didn’t get the room until ten past 3 which disrupted our days plans, and would have had to wait longer if it wasn’t for my partner complaining about it.  We also wanted our room cleaned the first morning and came back to our room around 4 o’clock to find it wasn’t cleaned which was disappointing.
Title: Too expensive for the level of service and room

Positive_reviews: It’s a very well presented hotel, in a excellent location
Negative_reviews: Having to find a car park after the concierge told me it would cost me £80 to park my vehicle for 24 hours! Not overly helpful or friendly staff and a mediocre breakfast (full English)
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: Our room was great with excellent facilities although unfortunately the hairdryer did not work.
Negative_reviews:
The swimming pool was smaller than expected and the changing facilities were too small... basically only two people can be in the changing facilities at any given time... very poor. 
The main reason we chose thus hotel was that it had a pool and very disappointing. 
breakfast was good but the tables were like coffee tables? Very modern impractical approach.
Title: Pleasant

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with River View
Positive_reviews: The view was amazing from a Riverview room
Negative_reviews: Staff were rude and upon arrival room was t ready made to wait an hour and a half past check in time of 2pm
Title: Okay

Negative_reviews: Staff was not helpful at all.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: The bed was comfortable, and the room was very neat and clean. We received fresh towels every day which was really nice !
Negative_reviews:
- I thought the location would be great but it was very Far from the underground (subway) 
- I barely could sleep at night, I could hear noises from other rooms.
- The hotel is located next to a train station and my room was next to the railway and I could barely sleep because of the noise of the train.
- I couldn’t use the tv , we asked the receptionist and one of the staff told us to pay a deposit of 400 Pounds ! Which was ridiculous!
- During our check in we didn’t get any proper information about the hotel , for example I wanted to use the swimming pool on my last day which is free btw. I went to the pool and one of the staff members told us that we have to make a reservation for the swimming pool. 
- the staff was not very friendly looking, I didn’t even feel welcomed .I have stayed in many Park Plaza hotels before but this one was the worst!
Title: Disappointing

Negative_reviews:
Had to change (shorten) length of stayy for all three bookings over last three weeks
1. Seemed to result in an unecessarily protracted check in process (even though I had e-mailed and said what was happening in advance)
2. Inabilioty to reduce fees is frustrating but accepted that was clear upfronnt
Title: no problems

Positive_reviews: Comfortable beds
Negative_reviews:
Evening meal on first night taken in room - food was cold on arrival 
Room cramped - with no view
Ran out of toilet roll - rang housekeeping to get another roll sent to the room- after 30mins still no toilet roll- had to go to reception to physically get one
Swimming pool- runs on a booking system - you have to book a slot - understandably due to size of pool - HOWEVER this is NOT mentioned on the hotel information online - the only reason we booked the hotel was so our son could use it during our stay
Evening meal on second night taken in the hotel restaurant- food was acceptable despite our order being wrongly delivered- the staff were rubbish- taking plates away whilst people still eating, taking drinks away while liquid still in them, general attitude was very poor
We would not recommend this hotel - there are much better ones for the same price or probably less
Title: In London for the marathon- needed a relaxing stay - most definitely did not get one

Negative_reviews:
Tv reception was very poor
Ice machine on the floor was not working
The lady who checked us in could have been more friendly and helpful
Title: Fine

Negative_reviews:
really disappointed; stayed here before and really rated it.
executive lounge not good-breakfast or lack of it in executive lounge was not explained to us.
went to the breakfast hall cost £50 for 2 not worth it.we complained but staff were pleasant but unhelpful.
Title: wont be staying here again

Positive_reviews: Great concierge-
Negative_reviews: Horrible plumbing problems
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: Modern rooms and bars/restaurants facility.
Negative_reviews:
Expected river view in the room- was told at reception £100 per night.. 
some room decor was a little tired and gruby.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Good location. 7-10mins from vauxhall tube station.restuarant & bar was ok although a bit overpriced for what it is.
Negative_reviews: Overall trip was a disaster. Check in process was ok, however we were pointed towards the wrong set of elevators. We spent a good 3 mins trying to find the room. During this time we asked for directions to our room from the housekeeping personnel that were around. The first 2 spoke zero english, she kept talking to us in spanish i believe. Finally a male member of staff was able to assist, pointing us in the right direction. Upon entering our room, we noticed that bathroom had not been cleaned. Towels & toiletries were changed , however there were multiple stains on the floor and the wall just by the toilet (looked like piss). The carpet was not hoovered (bits of food) and the hard floor had foot prints and dirty marks. We called reception and was told someone would come up. The lady who came up told us that the ?pee (stains) could not be cleaned, she did not acknowledge the dirty carpet & hard floor despite us pointing it out, she was incredibly rude and not at all professional. We went downstairs to complain, only to be told that house keeping would clean the room in an hour or 2. We asked for a room change which fortunately they agreed to. Suffice to say it was evident that the cleanliness and attention to detail was incredibly lacking for this hotel coz the 2nd room was clearly not well cleaned either (although the bathroom was better, no pee stains). Day 2 of our stay, we woke up to a cold room with the ac blowing cold air despite being set at the max of 28C. I rang reception and an engineer came up. He fiddled with the ac for about 30mins following which he said if it doesnt get warm in 10mins then it would be a "big job". Reception rang after to check if the issue had been resolved and after a long chat it was decided that we would be given a heater. 2 hrs later, housekeeping brought us a kettle😣! By this point we had given up all hope of a nice weekend getaway.
Title: Poor

Positive_reviews: Location good for London Marathon. Food was good.
Negative_reviews: Room was very tired and looked like it needed a deep clean. Toilet roll holder was hanging off the wall in the bathroom and the TV reception was poor and kept freezing. Breakfast was good and so was the room service food, however would not stay again @ £200 per night.
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Good location and public spaces were impressive
Negative_reviews: Room wasn’t made up for the kids bed when we arrived, had to call several times to get this arranged and robes etc delivered. Room was cold, air con didn’t seem to work properly and workers were hanging out of the wall under the desk.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews:
We loved the view. The high technology in the room. 
The facilities were great.
Negative_reviews: The room was sloppy. Not clean at all. Not what you would expect from such an expensive hotel.
Title: Ok. Not fantastic.

Positive_reviews: It looked lovely and was well maintained
Negative_reviews: The staff were very unhelpful
Title: Pleasant

Negative_reviews: Have a lot of problems with parking lot
Title: The hotel doesn’t have a park space, so customers have to walk faraway to train or use car valley.

Positive_reviews: Bed was comfy. Tea and coffee facilities were good, though only one small bottle of filtered water was supplied, only enough for 1 cup of tea. Lobby was nice
Negative_reviews: Perfunctory staff at reception. I was repeatedly hung up on, with no-one calling me back, when I tried to call and arrange something nice for my girlfriend. When I got to the hotel, they told me that they had already organised a room with a view, and a special welcome for us. The "view" was a grey block of flats next to us, with no view of the city/river, and there were 4 tiny macaroons for us as a "special welcome". Further to this, the shower felt more like I was getting peed on, and worst of all, a cleaner knocked on our door at 8:30am, 9:30am and 10:30am, while we were either sleeping, showering or dressing up. Won't be coming back
Title: Won't be coming back, I've stayed in hotels £100 cheaper that were better.

Positive_reviews: They didn’t respect the customer, I booked a double room. When I arrived they gave me a twin room. Even when I asked to change it, they gave me a room for disabled people. It was very disappointing when they treated me like this.
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: The breakfast was a little disappointing in that the scrambled eggs were of poor quality and there was restricted access for everybody trying to get to the benches of food provided.
Negative_reviews: I didn't like the door handle falling off the bathroom door and that I had to report it three days in a row to have it fixed.  I didn't like the bar fridge in the room being locked twice even though I had paid a 250 Pound deposit and that I tried to sign for a dinner in the restaurant only to be told that I had no credit, the waiter then went to the Front Desk and returned telling me that he was told I had no credit.  I paid by card, went down to the desk and made the Staff check and they said I did have credit, very embarrassing for me.   Our room was often not fully cleaned in that the glasses and the tea/coffee cups that we had used had not been changed when we returned to our room that evening.  We were given access to the Executive Lounge because of the above and was told that drinks, beer etc were free, when I went there I was charged.
Title: I asked the Staff if they had watched Basil in the sitcom Faulty Towers? A dissappointing stay.

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: Apart from location, it wasn't a good experience overall.
Negative_reviews: Staff wasn't very helpful, we couldn't see much professionalism and they weren't too helpful...would not recommend or go back as I travel a lot and stay in hotels but definitely not this one.
Title: Very Poor

Positive_reviews: The Hotel if you get a new set of Staff
Negative_reviews: The staff is not competent, unfriendly unhelpful and outride ridiculous. I was staying at Park Plaza several times but this was the last time. I booked 3 Rooms for myself and Consultants what are working for me. I wanted to extend 1 night for a consultant and was told if I book and pay 2 nights he can have 1 more night or otherwise try your luck on the internet. Never again, At the Restaurant the starter came after the Main meal, at the Bar we where told at Midnight we close but at 23:30 got told want to go early if we could finish. Never again and I will make sure I talk about it.
Title: NEVER AGAIN

Positive_reviews: Reception staff were lovely. Hotel itself was nice.
Negative_reviews: The housekeeping was terrible. We stayed four nights. We were asked if we would agree to not have housekeeping if any days as eco friendly thing. In return we’d get a bottle of wine or a voucher. We agreed to two nights out of four.  We never got our sheets cleaned. We knew as my lip bled onto the pillow.  We complained on the third night.  They said they’d send someone to change the sheets while we were at dinner. They didn’t. They said they’d have room cleaned the next day. That never happened. We complained again.  So out of the four nights no cleaning was done. We had towels replaced.
Title: Disappointing. Nice hotel. If they sorted the housekeeping it would be so much better.

Positive_reviews:
Great location lovely bar clean and posh reception area.
Live music in the evening was great as well
Negative_reviews: Room was to tiny. I booked executive double room but i was disappointed about room size and it looked different from the pictures
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews:
Room service was exceptional 
And room
Negative_reviews:
Call reception way to many many time Poor quality towels
No robes 
Two tiny showers gels pots 
No notifications that we had to ask the room to be cleaned 
Then was told house keeping would on there way after 1.5 hours nobody had arrived so called again to be told they are on there way 
We went out for an hour when we return the bed was made no clean sheets no clean towels no clean glasses 
So back on the phone to reception and house keeping
Title: Poor

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Negative_reviews:
Staff didn't knew what they are doing.
Needed to change room at 8-9 P.M, because bed and TV was broken.
Next room prepared for only for 1 person. (4 of us).
Overall we felt treated very poorly.
Title: If you are going to stay with your children, stay away from this hotel. Very bad experience.

Negative_reviews: no hairdryer in the room is not acceptable, also reception staff should focus on customers service not putting bunny hats on  , I have called the receptionin 2 days more than 30 times no answer .
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Breakfast was not a pleasant experience.
Title: Fair

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with River View
Positive_reviews: Location and view . Bed super comfy
Negative_reviews: It was not up to standard at that price . Nespresso not refilled so down to decaf by the end.  Camomile tea there first night but not after that . Not enough shower gel shampoo in the rooms. Swimming pool and spa main reason we booked three nights but because it was busy we had to book in advance to go which was impossible and not told that in advance . In the end didn’t get into spa . One morning woman in couch in front of lift complaining loudly about everything and staff member basically agreeing with her ! No newspaper available when I asked . On Sunday. Even for purchase . Staff helpful and informative but over worked
Title: Pleasant

Negative_reviews: Never ever left a bad review about a hotel but honestly this has got to be the worst hotel experience I've had. We got to the hotel excited to stay there. At the check in desk we were greeted by a the assistant. Who then typed something into the computer, then disappeared into the back for a good 10 minutes. Came out, checked us in. We proceeded to our room. Put the key in the door and shortly realised that someone else was already in the room. Personal belongings were everywhere. We went back down to the reception, explained what had happened and we were given a new room. The hotel was actually alright but that initial wrong room situation had got our backs up a little bit. So when we checked out, a day later we realised that the hotel had over charged us an extra £100. So we then had to go all the way back to the hotel to get a refund. The lady who dealt with us wasn't at all apologetic  or remorseful. Looks great but I'd never stay there again.
Title: Worst customer experience ever!

Positive_reviews: It is clean, well maintained and has all mod cons.
Negative_reviews:
The non river view suites are set beside train tracks for Waterloo station. If your looking to get some sleep give it a miss.
While there is a swimming pool it is very restrictive with only 12 allowed so you have to prebook your slots.
This information ahead of schedule would have made me choose a different hotel.
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Room was nice, staff were polite,
Negative_reviews:
Bad smell from Bathroom!
Tv reception was terrible! not worth watching.
View from window also terrible! all i could see was another hotel wall close to my window.
Overpriced for what i recieved.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: location
Negative_reviews: horrible view, no natural light, pretty cold in the room, lousy room service, the garbage was not lifted for 3 days .....
Title: Poor value for the money. "Superior" room means lousiest room :-(. But good location.

Positive_reviews: location
Negative_reviews: There is no one to help us bring our luggage in when we arrive. The bathroom door does not close. There is no shower or commode door. control for shower is faulty. We ordered food from room service and they took over an hour to bring up the food. If I did not call, they would have not delivered it. The food came and the rack of lamb to be cooked medium is crispy - way,way... too much over cook, I told them that we have 2 children who are very hungry and they did this to us... We will never come back to any Park Plaza Hotel after this, event hough we had a great time at the Park Plaza Hotel Westminsters the week before.  Disappointed completely. They should not charge us for that room service food. Awefull service.
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: The staff were polite and helpful and the bed was comfortable.  Room was a good size for the two of us and the location is a stone's throw away from Southbank.
Negative_reviews: Cleanliness of the bathroom could have been better if I'm not picking ( which I am because if the price of the hotel).  Behind the shower door was a clear black line of dust and hair. Also the door handle was broken.  The usb outlet in the room was faulty and didn't charge my phone or portable charger ( we tried 3 cables) which was a shame as though I didn't have a plug I was told because of the outlets I wouldn't need one.  But as I said this is all not picking and luckily I was off of work for my birthday so a dead phone wasn't so bad for an evening.
Title: Enjoyable and leisurely

Negative_reviews: The room on the 2nd floor is next to the railway, noisy, trains in every minute, you can't open the window (there is no possibility to open), the heater/air conditional was so loud, we had to turn off at night, the sofabed is very uncomfortable. The view: the railway and a stock area, photo attached.
Title: nice hotel, but our room was awful.

Positive_reviews: Nice staff , very helpful , the value of money on the hotel is reasonable.
Negative_reviews: There were no variety of foods in the breakfast but it was good overall. The location a little far from the shops. There were inly two elevators and one of them were out of service most of the time.

liked the environment and the layout.

I was sleeping. I was there for one night and needed to relax but waking up at 5.30 by a phone call not ideal.

Title: disappointing experience

Room_info: Studio Double Room with Sofa Bed
Positive_reviews: The room was nice, the storage cupboards were a great idea allowing more space in the bathroom. The design of the hotel was comfortable and calming.
Negative_reviews: The television seemed to have audio description on some channels which you couldn't turn off. The A/C could only be hot or cold, there was no warm setting. The beds were uncomfortable, including pillows. The mini bar although fitted as standard in the room, it wasn't made clear that it's contents were chargeable and therefore after consuming some of the items, upon check out we were surprised with a high charge. The breakfast was cold and the waiters/waitresses were not on point, we were offered tea but never received and our used plates, cups, etc were still left at our table until we left the restaurant.

Title: Disappointing

Negative_reviews: No coffee machine and minibar wouldnt open. Asked reception to rectify they made a note. After returning to room still no coffee machine or mini bar so room changed. Could not get through to reception on phone for whole stay always had to go down (15 floors) Not the best Park Plaza
Title: Not really a premium experience would not use again

Positive_reviews:
My mum and dad enjoyed the food. They had fillet steak and said it was
beautiful. The wine is a bit pricey 125ml is £9, but this was a special
occasion, so the price didn't matter.
Negative_reviews:
This was bought as a Christmas present for my mum and dad. It was also
their 40th wedding anniversary. I gave you special instructions of this
special occasion and they did have a note. I also called the hotel prior
to their stay and they advised something would be complementary. Your
website advised that a small deposit would guarantee the booking. 2 days
after booking, they took the whole amount. I manually updated the
details to my mum and dads name as advised by yourselves. When I called
the hotel they wanted another full payment from myself and this would be
refunded back to me within 5-10 working days. I have an email as proof.
They put them on the 13th floor with a view of the building. I am very
disappointed with the service and the complementary surprise. There was
no hair dryer in the room, which I find very strange, even the most
basic hotels have these facilities. They got the bill at the end of
their stay, which had £145.00 added for using the mini bar. They never
took anything from the mini bar. This was a clerical error. For being a
very favourable hotel, there was no bathrobes or slippers either. I have
my husbands mum and dad going this weekend. I'm not looking forward
to their feedback after their stay. I would not recommend this sister
hotel to anyone. Cheaper priced other Park Plaza hotels are much loved
and have everything you require for a memorable special occasion. I
regret totally booking this hotel.
Title: A bad choice of hotel

Negative_reviews: No view from the room
