Title: Overall pleasant, perfect for a quick one-night trip

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with River View
Positive_reviews: the location was good and nice view
Negative_reviews:
My partner did upgrade for the suite through phone because it was my birthday as a surprise after I booked in booking but when we arrived there they had no idea about it so it was poor communication and system also my partner paid for VIP reservation service so we can do early check-in and do special treatment for us and good services but unfortunately they didn't let us in early check in and we waited from 10 am till 2:30 pm ! Also the staff were too rude to us and they don't smile at all
the cleanliness was terrible they didn't clean for 3 days the suite ! they cleaned the toilet only but and rest of the suite was a mess and dirty and the bed sheets was the same for the whole stay it was dirty and they didn't changed it too nasty and the cake we ate and the finished bottle and glasses of wine they didn't pick it up for 3 days was there and they didn't clean the living room it was messy and dirty
also they charged us on meals and drinks that we haven't order !! and then they found out that there was someone took our name and orders food on our room number and our name so it's means there was breach of information between staff other wise how come someone random oder food and drinks on our NAME AND ROOM NUMBER how he knew that secret information if it wasn't breach from the system or staff and how come they have poor security that they allowed random person to order food on our name without checking if he was real guest or a thief  !!!! so the security there was terrible
also the second day they stole my adopter I left it in the bed and came back I couldn't find it.we told them and instead of apologizing or giving us a new one and checking with the room service to investigate they were too rude to us and told us to do police report if we want !
Title: it was terrible experience I would never ever come back to this hotel again !

Positive_reviews: Poor view in the rails... very disappointed !?
Negative_reviews: The view and first contact with receptionist
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: The hotel was in very close proximity to Westminster and the main tourist sites, and was just a short walk to the Vauxhall tube station which was also very handy for getting to and from the theatres etc.
Negative_reviews: On arrival we had a stain on a duvet in our room on the 15th floor, so got moved. The room we were moved (also on 15th floor) to had marks all over the walls and floor in the bathroom as if it had never been wiped or cleaned, along with a brown "smear" above the toilet roll holder. The concierge simply advised us to put some water on the shower wall and see if it improved. This caused a bad smell. I tried closing the shower down and it jammed. The next day we were moved to another room, which seemed fine. We later noticed a hole in the bedding, hairs under the pillow, a broken toilet seat and all the pillows were rock hard. Upon pointing this out to the so called Guest relations manager they wrote the issues down, and wrote "NBTD" at the bottom, (nothing better to do).........I returned to reception with another request, only to overhear them slagging us off and insinuating we were "playing them" and "playing games" and "after something"........"he wants something from us" etc etc. I then speak to the management the next day, and specifically asked for the General manager and received fob off, after fob off after fob off. A staff member also described us as "very difficult" right under our noses to other guests, however he did so in French, unluckily for him I speak the language, and when I challenged him he claimed they were speaking about football.........We were told General manager would be available at 3pm, we say we will be back by 3pm to speak to him, when we ask for him, the front of house manager tries to suggest we said 5pm not 3pm......I then go down at 5pm and he isn't available.........We ended up with uncomfortable pillows, a broken toilet seat, and a generally unclean room, and staff that just kept on insulting us quite frankly. I would never, ever return.
Title: Poor

Positive_reviews: Stayed with my Sister. Location lovely opposite the river. We liked the shower and bathroom facilities and the beds were very comfortable, but good sheets. Very good being able to adjust the temperature and drawer curtains etc by the bed. Good having coffee and tea facilities.
Negative_reviews: Only had a partial river view which disappointed us. Unfortunately a baby was crying for a lot of the night in another room, and we did not sleep very well because of that. We had no hairdryer in the room and phoned reception to acquire one. We were going to have breakfast, but did not want a full English breakfast and would have preferred e.g. just eggs florentine which would have meant an additional cost. Also not a very personal service when you have to queue for your own tea and coffee.We therefore did not stay for breakfast. The lead to the kettle in the room was not very long, which meant we had to put the kettle on the floor to boil it which is not ideal.
Title: Quite good, but could be improved.

Positive_reviews: The view over the Thames and location.
Negative_reviews: It was noisy, got mixed information from reception staff. Bed side light didn't work and even after reporting it we had to unscrew the light bulb very night so it would go off. Room was ok but could of been cleaner.
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Good location
Negative_reviews: Room incredibly hot even with the air conditioning on and window open - uncomfortable nights sleep.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Breakfast was reasonable, although it was overpriced. location of the hotel was good.
Negative_reviews: I booked through booking.com and on the web site it states that the hotel will take a £50 deposit. You in fact took £100 which was processed and taken from my account. Why was this done when the bill was already paid and no damages or outstanding items where incurred. We requested an upgrade and was told that it was not available. We heard another member of staff asking someone else if they wanted to upgrade. When I rang the hotel on 26/02/2019 about the £100 being taken from my account I was promised a call back. This never happened.
Title: The hotel was ok for what we needed as most of the time we where out and about.

Positive_reviews: Ive stayed in this property any times before and I have never had cause to complain. The location is perfect for my work, the hotel is stylish and usually clean and the staff are usually very helpful.
Negative_reviews: I had arrived at the hotel at around 16:30 after a very gruelling almost 14hr long haul flight and all I wanted to do was get some sleep. Even though im a Radisson Gold card holder I had to wait for almost 20 mins to get to the check-in desk at reception only to find that the room, which was supposed to be ready to check-in to at 14:00 was not ready and was informed by the staff I would have to wait for 1 - 2 hours before the room was ready for me. At that point I was so tired that I could barely keep my eyes open and the only thing that was offered to me is the reception staff told me they would keep my luggage for me while I waited. Ive just gotten off a very long flight I was exhausted, where was I supposed to wait, was I expected to sit in a seat in the lobby or aimlessly walk round London exhausted while they prepared my room. Id booked a room with a river view and in the end I ended up having to stay in a lesser priced room with no river view and the bathroom smelled as if it hadn't been cleaned properly. The apology I received, at reception for this was hardy convincing. The following morning I discovered the the reason why the room hadn't been ready, the previous day, when I left my room for work, ensuring the "please clean my room light was illuminated" the cleaning staff where stood in the corridor less than four rooms away gossiping. I arrived back after being away for over three hours and the room hadn't been clean. I was still suffering from jet lag so I just went to my room so I could sleep again. I later phoned reception to ask for some fresh towels, I've now checked out of the room, three days have gone by and im still waiting for those towels. Ive stayed in the hotel numerous times and never had a problem before but I can assure you I will think very strongly about staying there again. I dont know what has happened to the service in the hotel but it has plummeted from scoring a 10, in my eyes, to dow near a 0.
Title: Riverbank Park Plaza really dropped the ball

Negative_reviews: Better prices hotels to stay in for cleanliness and location.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: Friendly staff, tasty breakfast and good location.
Negative_reviews: Hygiene has got to be improved. Hair in the bathroom and bed; a lot of hair in a swimming pool. Steam room in the spa has got fallen off ceiling paint all other the steam room. The room is extremely small; way too much technology which failed when we tried to open the curtains or switch off the air con. No complementary water on arrival. It just isn’t worth £150 a night. Extremely disappointed and will never recommend my friends. Oh, forgot to mention that we had UHT milk which was gone off (8th August 2018), realised it too late when cup of a tea was made with lumps floating around. Even in travelogue you get consistent basic experience without a fault.
Title: Horrible hygiene but great breakfast

Positive_reviews: Breakfast, concierge
Negative_reviews: The room was small, they didn’t answer the phone (took to long to answer it). The housekeeping forgot the things I asked 2 times. The informations about the elevator when I got there , where all wrong . The first room I got was bad and the bathroom wasn’t cleaned

Title: Simple, ok place to sleep.  A bit expensive for what was offered.

Positive_reviews: Great location opposite Tate Britain and overlooking the Thames .. unfortunately that was really all I liked. Else is toiletries were a welcome treat.
Negative_reviews: The dark decor , black and pink, with striking dark red orchids gave the immediate impression of a Gentlemen’s Club...not really a welcoming design. This was matched by the demeanour of the staff who were either not interested in taking any responsibility for our stay or didn’t listen to issues that were raised. Poor arrangements for breakfast meant that some tables were knee high so causing clients to almost bend double while eating, also there was little healthy choice and items which would usually be included ( omelettes, eggs Benedict, kippers) had an additional fee. It was a bit of a scrum too as there was not really adequate space for the number of guests. The room was small with the twin beds pushed together ..cramped feeling and incredibly warm. We asked for the air conditioning to be fixed so that we could cool the room but it quickly reverted to heating only.
Title: Okay

Negative_reviews:
Mirrors dirty, no kettle in room had to phone and wait 45 minutes for it to be delivered.  Faulty wall socket.
Tea and coffee consumables were not replenished.  Room cold, and when tried to turn up heating noise from the fans meant you could not hear the tv.
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: The position was great but it would be helpful to warn guests that there are two Park Plaza hotels. We walked to the wrong one. We walked past the riverside one on the way but the name is hidden under the canopy over the main entrance.

Title: Poor

Title: bad

Title: Nice hotel but not good enough for the price

Positive_reviews: Modern building and facilities
Negative_reviews:
Room service
Cleaning was not a priority and on arrival back to the hotel (on the first day of an eight day stay) at 3pm, room had not been cleaned or serviced.
Face washers not replaced at all.
Not enough coffee sachets - had to ask for more (more than once) When requested, not provided 
only 1 cappuccino and 1 hot chocolate sachet supplied. Two guests??
Power plugs not working on bench.  Had to boil jug on ground.  Jug left on ground by room service for 8 day visit.
Air con not working. Reported this on 2 days. While advised that the air con would be looked at by two different staff. No change.
There were scales in bathroom which did not work. Why provide them and not have them working
Front staff while helpful on approach, failed to follow through with requests.
TV reception and channel viewing choice - very poor.
Minimal extra movies available for an excessive charge.
Title: Staff didn’t go out of their way at all- apart from doorman

Negative_reviews: Our room wasn’t that clean as the bedside table was dirty and the floor is dirty (not been hoovered  maybe ) there wasn’t any clean towel by the pool so I need to go and find staff to ask for towels?,sorry
Title: Pleasant

Negative_reviews:
In the morning me and my partner went to the spa, when we went back to our rooms we found that our card keys were not working so we couldn’t get into the room. As we were in our robes and slippers we decided to call the reception downstairs. wjen I called a lady in the reception answered and put me on hold for 15 minutes despite knowing that we weeenlocked out. She then disconnected the call and I called at least twice after that. In the end my partner had to go downstairs in his robe and slippers and have them sort out the issue. 
I am extremely unsatisfied and would like some sort of compensation for this service.
Title: Not good !

Negative_reviews: We was given a double room for a family and then told we was going to be brought a roll out bed. Also we was overcharged which left us short of money and had to come home early, our 5 year old child didn’t get to see the Shrek experience due to being overcharged.
Title: Very unorganised

Negative_reviews: Room inadequate for a family and not properly equipped. Children bed uncomfortable, toilet broken, shower door broken. Next to train tracks and lift so noise throughout the night
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews:
This was the second time I've stayed here,I booked it months ago and paid a lot of money for a suite as high as possible and a river view!
I ended getting a river view in the lounge area of my suite but not the bedroom area which is the main point of our visit, also I paid to have breakfast in the executive lounge and each day I went for breakfast they tried to tell me I was in the wrong place and should be on the 1st floor,even after ai explained I had payed for the privilege!!!
They then humiliated me in front of other guests making me wait there until they had confirmed this with reception as if I was telling lies!!!!!
I have booked a return visit for two nights at the end of March and will be expecting a better room and better treatment. I have booked to stay in the plaza on the river and look forward to your reply.
Regards
Jason Hazelton
Negative_reviews: Read my previous statement.
Title: Very disappointing

Positive_reviews: Was not happy i asked for well done egs and it was not cooked properly
Negative_reviews: And no parking
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Food in the evening was amazing and great value. As we were a very large party service was good  but some staff may need a little more training to attention to the smaller details. If someone has orders sparkling water don't top their glass up with tap water ! Feel the drinks a little over priced even for London
Negative_reviews:
Was a bit of hair in the shower and general bathroom area.

Title: It was nice could have been excellent but was let down in places

Positive_reviews: Rooms were a good size, great location!
Negative_reviews: Restaurant was a shambles - 45 min wait on 1st round of cocktails, with no apology - then a 30 min wait on 2nd round! Food was expensive, and small portions! We ordered 2 platters & extras - definitely not enough to feed 6! Cleaning staff were also super rude - forgot to put Do Not Disturb sign on when they tried to let themselves in at 9, and got told off!
Title: Average.

Positive_reviews: Everything was good. Beds extremely comfortable. We enjoyed using the pool even though very small. Breakfast was lovely with a great view of the river and houses of parliament whilst we ate it. Staff were very helpful.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: So frustrated that was charged extra £350 for no reason. Reversal was made but haven’t got money back  as of this comment 15 days after. Was told it’s due to inefficient bank system in UK which generally takes couple of weeks! Woof...
Negative_reviews: Shower is toooo small.
Title: Location is good

Positive_reviews: Great location requested an upgrade which waa available when we arrived. Lovely views from the room.
Negative_reviews: Bed very uncomfortable and room not cleaned or glasses taken that were empty and used from night before. Also shower gel and soap not replaced.
Title: Great location and views

Positive_reviews: Big bed and mood lighting. Fairly quiet.
Negative_reviews: Shower flow was terrible. Stayed at this property before with no such problem. Staff a bit robotic.
Title: Comfortable but needs more attention to detail.

Negative_reviews: Didn’t have breakfast as too expensive as couldn’t really advise if they could cater for my wife who is gluten and nut free, so didn’t bother
Title: Room facilities weren’t adequate, only 1 water, 2 tea bags, couldn’t find hair dryer, not sufficient

Positive_reviews: Great location, excellent view, nice pool.
Negative_reviews: Room not ready for check in at 2, had to wait an hour - messed up plans a bit as we were only there for 24 hours. Breakfast chaotic, had to sit at the bar. Staff seemed overwhelmed.
Title: We enjoyed it, but could be better for the price.

Positive_reviews: Although we wasn't very keen on the Hotel Rooms, the spa and Chino Latino restaurant was really lovely! Both very modern and done up really well. Customer Service in the Restaurant was amazing. Unfortunately I can't say the same for the Hotel!
Negative_reviews: It seemed like we weren't getting paid no attention when we requested a few things, especially from room service! We had to request slippers, a bath robe as we only got given one in room and other little things which resulted in them taking over half an hour each time! We tried to check in around 10-11AM as I stated we would be quite early, I understand this is subject to availability but it just would have been nice as I requested it like a month ago. When we came back around 3PM we checked into our room, however the bathroom door would not shut at all! We were confused as to how the house keeping didn't notice this when cleaning / servicing the room? It must have been noticed as it was stuck and wouldn't even slide half way! Or maybe it was noticed but they just didn't think people would care?! Very awkward if you would go to the toilet with the door wide open if you ask me! We rung up reception about this and stated someone either needs to fix it or we will have to move rooms (as we had plans for the afternoon) we didn't want it to waste our time. 40 Minutes and 4 phone calls later - a maintenance guy finally decided to arrive! After he was unable to fix or shut the door he then had the cheek to say "are you sure it was like this when you arrived" VERY rude! we had literally just checked into the room, went to go toilet and couldn't shut the door! Cannot believe he tried to accuse guests like that!! We then heard him call reception and say " I will be able to fix it but it will take quite a while" So the reception rang us and said they will move us rooms and call us back in a few minutes time - 10 minutes later no call.. so we took matters in our own hands and went out of our way to take our luggage and go down to reception. We then spoke to a manager who stated he will be moving us rooms, he was very professional and finally we felt like someone actually cared!
Title: Quite unsure of this Hotel

Positive_reviews: the food and the room was nice enough , but the booking in and checking out was disorgnaised and despite paying in advance the keep asking to pay for the 2nd night , had to get managers etc , it really took away as I felt stressed , it was suppose to be a relaxing time post a family death
Negative_reviews: The booking in and checking out was disorgnaised and despite paying in advance the keep asking to pay for the 2nd night , had to get managers etc , it really took away as I felt stressed , it was suppose to be a relaxing time post a family death
Title: Nice enough experience but spoiled by the checking in and out

Positive_reviews: Friendly staff, location, did try to give me best possible view as it was busy
Negative_reviews: After contacting at 1am about a loud banging, a gentleman came up to confirm it was an outside gate on the roof which was being swung by the wind. This same gate had woken me and my wife up again around 6am by then I decided to stay awake and check out but would rather had slept further but having being woken up I didn't pursue to complain. I found the lights in the toilet to have constantly been flickering and also the shower couldn't be set to a desired temperature as it was scorching hot all the time.
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Location
Negative_reviews: Cleanliness helpfulness not good
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: Not a great deal
Negative_reviews:
I made my reservation through Booking.com, when I received the email confirmation which was wrong, I called the hotel to amend. I was told only booking.com could correct the mistake. When I got put through, they supposedly couldn’t get through to the hotel and consequently, I had to pay £50 to change my booking.
Be warned, I spent an hour trying to correct their mistake but to no avail, best bit; I just got my UK mobile phone bill and they’ve charged me £30 for the calls... Not once was I told the number was premium rate. 
Overall, a very bad experience and from now on, I will be avoiding Park Plazas, there is plenty of other excellent London hotels which provide a better service with exceptional customer service.
Title: Poor

Positive_reviews: Room was well appointed.
Negative_reviews:
Noise from a function was horrendous-complained but nothing was done.
The style of the hotel was not for me but others might like it - frenetic flashing lights & breakfast served at low tables, lounge style seating.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: bedroom and bed were excellent
Negative_reviews: breakfast service was poor, restaurant over busy, and food not hot enough. also ran out of butter (as opposed to flora) both mornings.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: The restaurant is ok, location and bar is great
Negative_reviews: The room is way too close to the train station, can’t going to sleep until midnight, wake up by train again at 5 am, didn’t have a good sleep at all, disappointed overall
Title: Not how I expected, disappointed

Positive_reviews: Location. Friendly staff
Negative_reviews: Noisy air condition. Breakfast expensive for what it was offered. Old fashioned room decoration.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Lovely room and products
Negative_reviews: I couldn’t sleep as the room was too hot. Not sure if the air con didn’t work but I had it on the lowest setting and the room was still too hot. Plus either the hairdryer was fault or it just gets really hot as I burnt my neck on it unfortunately.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: the heating was not working and no one would answer the phone to correct it. it was also very cold that night, the manager finally came and he could not fix it, i have him on video confirming he could not fix it and would refund the room but has done done a refund, now i have the head ache of chasing the hotel for a refund!!
Negative_reviews: the heating was not working and no one would answer the phone to correct it. it was also very cold that night, the manager finally came and he could not fix it, i have him on video confirming he could not fix it and would refund the room but has done done a refund, now i have the head ache of chasing the hotel for a refund!!
Title: terrible experience, i would not advise anyone to stay here

Positive_reviews: The lobby and staff were very nice and helpfull
Negative_reviews: I didnt like the quality of the cleaning nor the confort of the room. For three days I complain that AC was not working and it was to hot in the room, nothing was done , in fact they made me sign a document authorizing the windows to be open and latter on I see that there´s no possibility of openning the windows. They offered a fan, in was placed a heater ! So, I really hated.
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews:
Not much.
We changed rooms 3 times as the first 2 were in the middle of a renovation and there were tools on the floor in the corridor and the whole etage smelt of paint.
The second 2 rooms on the 8th floor, one had water drippjng through the ceiling and smelt of smoke, in the other there was something wrong with the air conditioning and the room was like a sauna. We complained to the manager who was very nice and actually upgraded us, but it was still very time consuming.
The drinks in the bar were exorbitant, 11 pounds for a small aperol spritz, no crisps or nuts either. You couldn't get a coffee in the bar before 11 oclock if you were not having breakfast which was both ridiculous and very annoying as because  the hotel isn't very central we had to walk for about 30 minutes to find somewhere.
Then to top it all on the second night of our stay the fire alarm went off at 22.45, which was extreemly frightening as we were on the 14th floor.When we arrived outside in bare feet and dressinggowns we were told by a guy smoking outside the hotel that it was a false alarm...... no one from reception apologised or gave us any explanation which we found atrocious, we returned to our rooms rather worried and as you can imagine we didn't sleep very well.
We were all really disappointed with lots of things, the reception gave us no information of where anything was when we checked in, so I think they definitely need some training in customer relations.
Most of the staff didn't acknowlege you in the corridors which isn't very  good either.
All 4 of us have stayed in lots of london hotels booked through you and have never had such a bad experience, none of us would stay there again.
Negative_reviews: Almost everything
Title: None of our group would stay there again.

Positive_reviews: Where it was
Negative_reviews: Not well maintained
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: The restaurant room was pleasant
Negative_reviews:
Mould in the shower. Bulb missing in the standard lamp. Rubbish bin dirty, still had rubbish clinging in it.
Had to boil the kettle on the floor, as no socket by the sideboard! A twin room with only one bedside light!
Title: Room was disappointing for the reasons stated. The public areas were pleasant.

Positive_reviews: Staff were attentive and polite, room service was excellent.
Negative_reviews: Bed too Hard as well as pillows, a lot of staff but a visible sign where you are required to check in would be useful.
Title: Good but not memorable.

Positive_reviews: Clean and modern.
Negative_reviews: Fire Alarm at 5am. Unable to explain the cause by checkout at 9.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: The smart controls in the room, and nothing else.
Negative_reviews: The room cleanliness was appalling, filthy bathroom, no fresh toilet rolls, one bath towel, unwashed coffee cups and spoons, duvet thrown on the bed and not made, warm breakfast, some kind of rip-off deal when ordering drinks, so that everything was a "large" at double the price.
Title: This is our 5th trip in what was a good hotel, we wont ever go back, there is so much competition!

Positive_reviews: Location
Negative_reviews: No heating in the room for the night, noisey appliances and air con. Toilet flush was faulty. No real apology from the reception staff on checkout.
Title: Very Poor

Positive_reviews: Hotel decor and bed comfortable
Negative_reviews: Female staff member in executive lounge was not very friendly
Title: Stay was good. However I booked multiple rooms and my work colleges shared a twin room with no door.

Positive_reviews: The view was amazing.
Negative_reviews: The fire alarm went off at 5 am for quite a long time and we had no apology or explanation as to why this went off. I was absolutely terrified as I was staying in a room on my own on the top floor.
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews:
The Concierge was helpful
The Doorman was helpful
Negative_reviews:
The Decor was depressing 
The cleaner did not clean my room well
The breakfast was not good
Title: Dissapointing

Positive_reviews: Security is great and the staff were very approachable
Negative_reviews: Rooms both smelt of marijuana one on 12th floor one on 5th floor. Told it was the the spray house keeping using, when it was actually coming through vents.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews:
Very customer-friendly staff !
Spacious rooms
Hair dryer, iron, bath robe and slippers
water kettle, mugs, tea, Nespresso machine and pads, all complimentary 
luggage at check-out day well taken care of until actual departure in the afternoon.
Negative_reviews:
at check-in on Tuesday night 6/11/18 we were assigned room 315 which was next to rooms which were being remodeled, judging from the dust in the hallway and the plastic tape and carpet protection layer.  Besides, the smoke detector in the hallway closest to our room was covered (to keep dust out according to the staff member) however we considered it an unsafe situation.
I went to reception desk and explained the situation and we were assigned room 303 which was larger with a separate sitting area.  Assigning room 315 should not have happened in the first place yet staff was very accommodating.
Lights and curtains operated by means of remote devices placed on the night stand.  At my side of the bed the device did not work at all.
On Wednesday night after the room had been cleaned and we returned to the hotel, we noticed that the carpet near the bed had not been vacuumed at all !
Title: Mixed feelings, very friendly staff yet cleaning and equipment in room somewhat below standard

Positive_reviews: Room was ok
Negative_reviews:
Made mistakes with room service the first night . 
Next day we were refused food as 
No restaurant open across the hotel both shut .
Only room service which took 45 minutes and still wasn’t ready so we had to cancel and leave the hotel for our journey hungry .
Title: Not great

Positive_reviews: The hotel was very nice.
Negative_reviews: The room wasn’t ready at 310pm when the check in time was 2pm,we had a family room and the beds for the children when returning from the show weren’t made up!!!! NOT good enough...
Title: Wouldn’t stay here again

Positive_reviews: Bed
Negative_reviews: They don't change bedsheet till you tell them,
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: The location was great. The reception area was impressive and first impressions when walking in were incredibly good. Staff were able to store my luggage until a room became available for me.
Negative_reviews: My room was not ready even though it was past the check in time. I was told that I was checked in but there was no indication when a room would be available. I had to go back myself 30 minutes later to see if there was one. After 5 minutes I was given a room, and the (different) member of staff apologised. Upon entering the room, it was not what I paid for. The pictures were totally different to the reality. The room had a sloping ceiling meaning I could not stand up in either corner. There was only one small floor window, and an 'artificial' window next to it which was just a light panel with curtains across. I felt extremely claustrophobic. The bed was ok, however the bathroom was not to the level of cleanliness I expected. The water pressure in the shower was very poor and the 'rain' shower head obviously needed cleaning as water was shooting off in all sorts of directions.
Title: Impressive at first glance, very disappointing in reality

Positive_reviews:
Style of the hotel and Location was great. 
Restaurant area in hotel had a great view at lunch across the embankment. Lunch portions where great size and the club sandwich was lovely.
Concierge where lovely and helpful for storing luggage while we waited for our room.
Negative_reviews:
Arrived at 13.45 to check in and the room was not ready for a 2pm check in which was expected, so we had lunch in the restaurant as staff said the room would be ready in 20 mins, staff in resturant were not interested and you have to order at the bar and ask for menus etc. Came back after lunch after 1.5 hours and room was still not ready, staff where blunt and offered a disabled or twin room instead. Finally were given the room we booked after waiting, no apologies or empathy to our wait and room key handed over with no description of what floor etv. Bathroom wasn't clean, shower hadn't been wiped down (Watermarks all over glass shower door and mirror was dusty with marks on).
There was an iPad next to bed that was lit up blue to close curtains and turn on lights, air con etc which seemed a great idea until the blue light did not go off all night, had to put a towel over it to make the room dark as it was a bright blue floresent light. Air con in the room didn't work, as it pumped out hot air, so the room was boiling hot (in November).
Title: Location was great, cleanliness and helpfulness of staff could be better.

Positive_reviews: Staff were helpful on arrival. Room was clean coffee n tea supplied . Lovely bathroom but a bit further away than expected.
Negative_reviews: I didn't like we were supposed to have breakfast included but then when getting to the hotel told a 5 pound charge for a tray each. Also having to pay for tv . The remote and noise kept me awake as well.
Title: A bit out of the way

Negative_reviews: Bad sound isolation. In particular, noisy works took place during the morning (around 9:00) of Friday 2nd of November. When I reported it, the reply of the Reception was limited to just a “sorry”.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: The concierge and business center staff were extremely courteous and took the extra mile to help out the hotel guests.
Negative_reviews:
Beware! The cleaning staff walks in the room while you are inside the room, without knocking or wait for you to open the door. We were staying at the hotel during a conference and the cleaning staff and their manager was very much in a hurry to clean the rooms that:
1. They come in the room at 9 in the morning to clean the room, without knocking. 
2. They just tidy up the blanket and leave the sheets in mess underneath. 
It can be a mistake if it happens once and to one room, however it happened over and over again and to other of my conference colleagues as well. 
This is a big NO! in the hotel industry. 
I’m definitely not staying in this hotel again.
Title: Beware! The cleaning staff walks in the room while you are inside the room, without knocking..

Positive_reviews:
Reception Staff, specially Duty Manager..
Very good and quick response to a very serious matter..
Negative_reviews:
A little loud everywhere..
Trains, working or windows not shutting properly..
Title: Nice

Positive_reviews: The room was very nice, great location only 10mins from the subway and centre of London
Negative_reviews: Arrived at 2 o’clock check in time and was told room would not be ready till 3 as they had a busy night which is a joke, comaplined and manager was very helpful, most of the staff are forgien so with a strong Scottish accent they could not understand me one bit. Also walked into the hotel at 12 o’clock and was challenged to show my room card as they didn’t believe me and my girlfriend were staying in the hotel as many other people walked past us without being checked. I think it was due to our age as we are 18 but still not acceptable
Title: Was good but could be better

Negative_reviews: Waited ages for breakfast table
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews:
It was clean and the suite had plenty of room to move around . 
The door man was great , his name was Dom and he really engaged with the children, making it fun and exciting . He is a real asset to the hotel .
Negative_reviews:
The second double bed was a very thin mattress on a very basic sofa bed . Big jutting our legs which were quite dangerous for my children . 
The room was cold even if I turned the heating on it blew out cold air ? 
The shampoo bottles hadn’t been replaced and two were half full . 
I don’t like using them anyway but leaving half used ones in the bathroom just doesn’t look very nice . 
It wasn’t worth over £300 per room .
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews:
Loved the control panel to operate the AC, light, etc  really good level of darkness not total blackout but really effective.  Loved having a bath (tub) and separate SHOWER.
Really comfort with good lighting for work. 
The overall good experience was lessen by the dirty floor etc
Negative_reviews:
I arrived at the room to find glasses on the floor outside, the floor was wet but that may have been the previous guest.  The floor/carpet was desperately needed to be hoovered.  Gained the impression that the cleaner stopped halfway through the process and forgot to come back and finish the job. One sheet of paper and not a pad, no pen, little coffee but two good packets of biscuits.
Why didn't I complain basically rushed out in the evening and again in the morning, just didn't have time.
Title: a superior hotel

Positive_reviews: Room was clean and location was good Check in and check out were quite quick
Negative_reviews: Room was very cold Air conditioning was supposed to come on at a warm temperature but it didn't. Bar area also very cold so not comfortable to sit and have a drink Breakfast was cold - could not eat any of it. Advised the waitress who just shrugged and walked off. Advised manager at check out who apologised and asked me to e-mail the complaint. Still waiting for a reply and a refund for a breakfast where payment was already taken off my card 5 days before we arrived and we did not eat!
Title: Substandard

Negative_reviews: No veiw
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Complimentary dinner, for inconvenience.
Negative_reviews: Too cold. No heating. No slippers. No bath robes. No heating in bathroom.
Title: Too cold

Positive_reviews: Would not recommend at all
Negative_reviews: Building renovation taking place on the floor they put us on, strong smell of fiberglass resin which gave my partner a headache, electrical socket hanging off wall exposed wiring, would have expected to be told at the point of booking, terrible experience.
Title: Terrible

Positive_reviews: The only positive was the courteous business center staff
Negative_reviews: Not friendly or courteous check in manager.
Title: Poor

Negative_reviews: Series of disasters throughout the stay. When we checked in we were advised to let reception now if the sofa bed had not been made up for my daughter though we were reassured it should have been. Unsurprisingly it wasn’t. Items like third cup, towels and hairdryer were all missing. The shower sliding door was also stuck closed meaning it was usable and we informed reception stating it was urgent as needed to get out quickly to a show. After a wait a very helpful guy appeared and he tried to free it but it smashed leaving it unsafe. My daughter was really upset at the whole experience. Security then appeared who were more concerned with who was to blame. We were in a room with an unsafe bathroom so no access to a toilet or shower. Reception finally called and said we would change room but at this stage we were running late so had to leave. No apology at any stage until I complained at check out and charged in full.
Title: Disaster

Positive_reviews: Food from room service was nice and the location of the hotel.
Negative_reviews: The attitude of staff, not very friendly especially those at the restaurant during breakfast. Room was not clean, food was lying on the chair and floor, and bed was not made properly. Above all toilet seat was broken, tissue paper box was empty.
Title: Not a good value for money, will not recommend due to arrogant attitude of staff & poor cleanliness

Positive_reviews: The room was comfortable and modern in appearance
Negative_reviews: Staff were unfriendly, my bank card wasn’t accepted despite the hotel taking 2 deposits in the past from it. They tried to demand a credit card deposit from me which I declined then tried to say I needed to give an email for emergency contact when they only wanted it for marketing purposes. The room was a bit smaller than expected and the view was another apartment block approx 30’ away.
Title: Disappointed

Positive_reviews:
Great view!
Nice facilities!
Nice and spacious rooms!
Excellent breakfast!
Negative_reviews:
Really bad management!!!
Not a good check-in experience!
Not clean - dirty!
Issues with the rooms - With the electrical command panels and lights.
Title: Trying to ruin a special night!

Positive_reviews: The location is great and staff are polite and friendly.
Negative_reviews:
Rooms can feel a bit dark as the hotel has tall buildings either side. 
The room had not been cleaned probably and the room was 2 hours later then check in.
Title: Great location, room not clean on this occasion.

Negative_reviews: The room was dirty on arrival, standards very poor not what I expected.
Title: Poor

Positive_reviews:
Staff were friendly and helpful 
Location is good
Negative_reviews:
Our room telephone was not working for the whole of our stay 2 nights despite repeated attempts to get someone’s attention. On the matter 
We had to go downstairs to ask for towels 5 times!
And 3 times to ask for our room to get serviced !
Absolutely unacceptable practice!
Title: Very poor service

Positive_reviews: The hotel is in a good location, near Vauxhall subway station, from where is very easy to connect with many places. The beds are extremely confortable, the bathroom is of a good size and has a good shower. The breakfast (included) is good, with a large variety of items, and more than enough to start the day. Waitress in restaurant are very kind. Our room didn't have a nice view, but the view from the lounge (12th floor) is fantastic.
Negative_reviews: The staff (excepting the doorman and the restaurant staff) seemed to be always in a rush whenever I had a question or a problem with the room. They seemed bothered by my questions or requests. We traveled with an 11 year old, and booked a triple room, but upon arrival, the sofa bed was not done, and we had to request an extra set of towels. They took long time to have this done. There is a lounge in the 12th floor that was offering beer and pretzels (didn't see the pretzels anywhere) for Octoberfest, we decided to have our lunch there just before leaving to save time. We ordered two club sandwiches that took about 50 minutes to prepare, and were left in our table without service, no cutlery, napkins nor condiments.
Title: Good business hotel, not really for families or leisure.

Positive_reviews:
Location, very nice and close to the centre.
Hotel vey nice but the room was not correctly clean.
Negative_reviews:
Air conditioning was not working and fixed after 4 hours.
Customer relation manager was not kind and  when I complained, because half of my staiyng in the room have been without air conditioning, he just said that "at the end the problem has been solved to him",
Title: good

Positive_reviews:
Room was modern  with a good view over the Thames 
Breakfast was too a high standard. Staff in restaurant were excellent.
Negative_reviews:
Some staff make you feel a little uncomfortable with the way they look you up and down as if the hotel is too good for you. 
Room cleaning wasn't bad but could be better. For the price paid I would expect better.
Title: Good but could be better

Positive_reviews: Comfy bed? Toiletries
Negative_reviews:
I attended a medicine conference- The hotel is impressive in terms  of lighting, neon everywhere, even the staff says it affects them.
The conference staff refilled mineral water bottles with tap water - not ok, especially for nutritionists! 
Takeaway Rubbish in corridors on level 7 next to the lift was left there for two days. 
WiFi kept dropping out
Sauna out of order for duration of stay.
Room type was incorrect despite double checking this on check in (we booked a twin)
Food at lunch was cold, due to staff removing lids when lunch was due not when we arrived (poor communication)
Rationed portions at lunch with comments like ‘try this one bite of chicken first and if you like it come back for more’ which left us felt like we were children despite paying £3000 for the conference. 
Won’t stay again.
Title: Cost control is getting in the way of customer service

Negative_reviews: I had to ask for the complementary water everyday. The cleaners didn't bother to wash the cups and the level of cleaning was not satisfactory
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: Comfy bed.
Negative_reviews: Bar staff, waited ages to check out and the daily cleaning of the room was not that good. 5 night stay and the bed never got changed.
Title: OK hotel. Expensive for what we got.

Positive_reviews: beds were comfy
Negative_reviews: the carpet leading to pool was filthy. pool is very small and not enough beds. steam room was not working. in the room there was only slippers for 1 person when booking was for 2 people. the shower door was off the hinges and dangerous. maintenance man had to be called. fire alarm went off at 7am on sunday so no lie in as we had to get dressed and get in corridor before it turned off.
Title: disappointing

Positive_reviews: 地点好
Negative_reviews: Stayed 5 nights Ask for room cleaning on the second day morning while I left an envelope of thick documents on the desk. I didn't noticed until the next day morning when I was working on the desk that I found my envelope was torn open. (Imagine if it was money inside!)I Immediately called gst service and then was directed to different ppl and then was told they would investigate. The loss prevention guy was called upon to take notes which actually was me filling out his question form. He said they were checking. Yet until I checked out no one gave me feedback on this. Also upon check out the black chubby long hair lady at the reception was of really snobbish attitude when I asked for my folio? I had no idea just saw that she kept shaking her head slightly with an air of complaint and snobby. I was in a hurry to airport otherwise i would like to check out personally with her what's wrong with her head!
Title: Not safe at all

Positive_reviews: Bedroom
Negative_reviews: Staff and service
Title: Think again if your want good service

Positive_reviews: Rooms were nice ...view no so looking at other rooms oposite. ...tv poor channels choice
Negative_reviews: Bar ....the bar staff took 10 mins for our drinks then they were wrong ...Sent them back and then my wife's drink was forgotten and I had to ask again....perhaps if bar staff actually concentrated on service and not chatting female guests up they may be able to actually give the service the prices deserve ..... £24 for 2 drinks that were poorly made and poorly served.
Title: Ok

Negative_reviews: service was appalling in the bar. Couldn’t open the mini bar. Fire alarm went off at 7.30 Sunday morning. The receptionists were abrupt and rude and it was overpriced.
Title: Never going back.

Positive_reviews: Breakfast is good
Negative_reviews: The room is not clean
Title: Room is dark, and not clean.

Positive_reviews: Fixtures and fittings
Negative_reviews:
Staff talking to one another in their own language 
Check in took too long
Title: Ok

Positive_reviews: They view and location was great
Negative_reviews: Our stay was okay eventually after we complined a few times over the rooms when we arrived the room wasn't ready then they gave us a twin room n not a double so eventually we got a decent room
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: The food was outstanding, staff in the bar were extremely helpful.
Negative_reviews: Our greeting was a little frosty. A key was given to us and we were told to go over there to the lift. The room was of decent size but wasn't very clean. There was a big hole in the bathroom ceiling and the shower wasn't clean. The staff on reception when we left were rude.
Title: The reception are and bar was very grand and inviting. Wouldnt stay again.

Positive_reviews: Bed was quite comfortable, staff at reception and in restuarant was nice and helpful, nice river view from restaurant
Negative_reviews: if someone likes bleak bathroom (dark walls and ceiling) so it is right place to stay. Light ,temperature in room controlled from panel - not very convenient especially during night.  Same feeling in elevators - stay in the dark with hardly lit stars. On first day no one cleaned our room, there was dirty in corridor ourside.
Title: Interior of room made our stay cheerless

Positive_reviews:
Looked pretty, relatively close to most things touristy. 
Nice bar on an old boat floating on the Thames across the road.
Negative_reviews:
Issues with receiving our room deposit back. Had to return to hotel for issue to be resolved. 
When we checked the lady at reception failed to inform us there was maintenance occurring on the same floor. Expensive room that was nicely presented however felt the staff let us down
Hard beds
Title: Be aware when giving room deposit

Negative_reviews: Staff could have made me feel more welcoming
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Check in really quick
Negative_reviews: Looking out on to another room asked for a special request and was no reply or nothing. I just expected more and there was like crumbs on our floor.
Title: Was ok could be better

Positive_reviews: Nothing at all after the worst ever customer experience at check in
Negative_reviews:
Poor customer service 
Looking to get every cent out of you
Title: Worst customer experience

Negative_reviews: On arrival the reception staff took 2 lots of holding from our travel account which left us out of pocket for pounds and when the refund was processed it took several days to be returned.  Very inefficient proceedure - we were very upset and no apology or anything offered to cover the stuff up.  Also a chipped wine glass not replaced by house keeping until we had to call and get it changed.
Title: average

Positive_reviews: In room facilities ie. auto opening and shut curtains and light/air on functions
Negative_reviews: Building work impacting on corridor to room, noise early in morning made by workmen
Title: Below standard

Negative_reviews: There was building work ogling on right outside of our room and the hallway leading to the rooms had a covering all over the flooring. It was noisy and the workmen started early when we woke up there the next day.
Title: Not good

Negative_reviews: Hotel overbooked. We were bundled at midnight into a taxi to another park plaza hotel. Another taxi next morning backtrack to our original riverbank hotel for the remainder of our 4 night booking.  Zero compensation offered for inconvenience and wasting of about 4 hours of our vacation.  Hotels are quite nice, but no compensation offer?????  Not happy experience at all.
Title: Less then expected

Positive_reviews: the staff are respectful and friendly, nice gym and nice pool.
Negative_reviews: There were a renovation next to my room, the sounds was unbearable it seems we were at construction site, I have talked to the reception and I asked them to move me to another room and they did, however the construction noises  still there. Honestly, I would recommend to contact the property to be sure there is no construction before you book.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: Good location
Negative_reviews:
Used mans pants in the wardrobe made the room feel unclean has to get guest services to remove them 
Coffee maker in the Room however no sugar or milk
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Good location and clean rooms.
Negative_reviews: This is 2 hotels but it is not very clear on arrival and looks like the more up market part get all the decent river view rooms. Also they allocated us 2 rooms and then when we came back to pick up the keys, having arrived to early for the rooms to be ready, they had moved one of the room bookings to an entirely different floor. Finally the breakfast is nothing special.
Title: OK hotel but nothing special

Negative_reviews: Bathroom was a wet room, there was a bad smell in the bathroom I think due to bad drainage.
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: Staff were friendly and great location
Negative_reviews:
Noise from builders at 6.45am.
Room when cleaned remained very dusty and carpet was wet too.
Builders laid protective carpet at 6.45am Monday morning, shouting swearing and crashing against my bedroom door. I raised it with staff who seemed disinterested.
Title: Three expensive nights and won’t return

Positive_reviews: The room was very comfortable and an ok size
Negative_reviews: We found the air conditioning very noisy and had to turn it off.
Title: Very comfortable beds and bedfing

Positive_reviews: Booked a room for my partner and I and requested a cot for my 14 month old baby ahead of booking. This was confirmed. Checked in 2pm and the cot was not in the room. A travel cot was bought in with some old sweets in it. Small problem - it had no mattress! After a debate about child safety and a mattress we left for a few hours. The manager promised to resolve it prior to us coming back and to phone. No phone call! We got back to the room and the travel cot had been lined with towels by head of house keeping! Apparently no mattresses are provided and no one has ever complained before. It took till 7pm to have to move rooms and I had to sleep with the baby in the bed and ensure he did not fall out! They did give us complementary room service but I would have preferred a safe place for my baby to sleep! Cleanliness in rooms was not great either. On a positive note the location is great and the swimming pool! Staff need training as it was like the computer says NO! The hotel is not suitable for young children.
Negative_reviews: All of the above!
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews:
The rooms are not properly cleaned. Corridors are filthy, even lift bottons had finger marks/smears that were visible throughout my 6 day stay.
First room had to be changed due to air conditioning not functioning and the room not cleaned. Despite complaints through calls, housekeeping did not show up. Front desk also was not answering calls; I can imagine if it was an emergency.
Throughout my 6 day stay sheets were not changed.
Negative_reviews:
Need to improve the cleaning of the rooms including the corridors. I was on 12 floor and it was filthy for the amount paid.
Slow response to phone calls by front office.
Title: Poor standard of cleanliness for a hotel of this standard and price.

Positive_reviews: Fairly central hotel. Fairly clean
Negative_reviews: For the price of the room I expected better but I guess you are paying for location.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Very comfortable clean room. Fab TV
Negative_reviews: Never before when I ordered tea for breakfast did I get a cup of very strong tea out of a communal pot. Awful. Breakfast disappointed all round. Wasn’t hot enough.
Title: Pots of tea please!

Positive_reviews: I've stayed at this hotel before principally due to its location to planned business meetings and it is very adequate for this purpose being right by the river and within easy walking distance of Westminster/Whitehall. The rooms are well designed and comfortable with the appropriate amount of space for working. I opted for a superior room which had a good sized desk which was perfect for working in the room.
Negative_reviews: Considering the detail of the Room Service Menu, the product was rubbish. I don't know whether the kitchen was understaffed, not working, not bothered or all three but the food was tepid and lacked taste. I ordered a Vegetarian burger with garlic mushroom topping which consisted of one mushroom with a slice of cheese on top of it. The side order of julienne fries were barely even warm. Very poor show!
Title: Good location but needs to sort out its room service offering

Positive_reviews: Great location
Negative_reviews: The swimming pool and spa were not functional; it was pretty much a building site and the staff failed to mention that. I waited for someone to come up and unlock the fridge for me so that I can get some water, but they never turned up.
Title: Average

Negative_reviews: Very dusty rooms , there was work going on outside our room which would start early in the morning with noise , house keeping was very bad
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Location  good  for vauxhull venues
Title: Pleasant

Negative_reviews: Stayed for one night, from 8am the morning of checkout the house keeping staff knocked on the door on the hour every hour and also used their keys cards to enter the room. Completely ridiculous and clear that they simply wanted to wake you in the hope you checked out sooner. This is a four star hotel in facade only. I complained to reception at check out and I got nowhere.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: The bed was comfortable; the shower water pressure was great.  Location was convenient for transit.  Nice view along the river, which is ideal for walking and just steps away from the hotel.
Negative_reviews: We asked for a quiet room and were on the train track side of the hotel (something like 7 tracks run along the Waterloo line right behind the hotel) - which was remarkably loud at first - you get used to it after a while, but that first night was tough; it was clear that the room was not vacuumed once during 4 days there; the air conditioning vents are only in the front room - no air circulation in the bedroom at all (it was hot & humid during our visit).  Oh, the plumbing in the bathroom - you can hear all the other showers/baths above you draining.  The low tables in the restaurant, if you choose to go, are so uncomfortable - eat at the bar.
Title: Just okay

Positive_reviews: Food was excellent and staff was very nice again as stayed here before you can't fault that but if your only on a short stay why would you want to call reception because of things not being right.
Negative_reviews: What would of been nice was to be told that right next door they were building more rooms and the floor was covered in what looked like plaster we walked in everyday the noise was horrendous the last day was the worse we walk down the corridor and their was a fire sign hanging from the ceiling from a angle to either hit someone or take somebody's eye out, we didn't have enough tea and coffee so had to ring and I've never had a hair dryer in the room before, I usual take one this time I wish I had. Its a shame its a great hotel the staff are helpful and friendly things like this just let's it down.
Title: Short break with a bit of strees this time

Positive_reviews: The room was spacious
Negative_reviews: The sofabed wasn't suitable for 2 children. The bedding didn't fit, the mattress was uncomfortable, no spare pillows etc. Soundproofing is terrible. We could hear neighbours and traffic. We had to move rooms because of noisy neighbours and then wait ages for housekeeping.
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: Concierge Mr Bardely is an excellent helpful guy
Negative_reviews: Location
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: Friendly staff , good price for london
Negative_reviews: Bad housekeeping, the room and bathroom doesn’t get cleaned probably room was dirty and also the bathroom wouldn’t stay in this hotel again
Title: Pleasant

Negative_reviews: The cleanliness of the room was very poor. The cleaner did.not vacuum clean the floors. You need to monitor the male cleaner as rooms are not clean.
Title: Very disappointed with the room cleaniness

Positive_reviews: The door men were very helpful and polite/friendly.
Negative_reviews: Attention to detail on cleanliness, a bottle top and hair band were on the floor, fluff on the face flannel.  Smell of sewage in bathroom. Bar staff were not really interested in the customers.
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Room and bed comfortable
Negative_reviews: The Shower glass cubicle was filthy and had obviously not been cleaned. Kettle was missing from the room and we had to request one. We have yet to be refunded the £50 debit card deposit (taken at check-in) despite the invoice saying so.....don’t think the refund had an authorisation code, so going to have to chase this up with the hotel.

Positive_reviews: Comfortable Bed. Well positioned for city eating, entertainment and sights.
Negative_reviews: Executive Room  to rear not clear on booking subject to continual train noise. Corridors very narrow carpet messy, stepping round trolleys / linen and food trays. On entry missing shower robes & slippers, soap part used no shower gels. Electric curtain section off rail. Cupboards dusty.
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: location
Negative_reviews: behavior of the Manager  called JP...HE WAS SO RUDE.SO ARROGANT.....one of the staff members told us that he behaves like this with all booking.com customer because they are not his direct customer and they pay less to the hotel compare to the direct customers my advice is to book direct and not with the booking .com if you don't want to treated like a second class customer

I left the hotel on Thursday but still have not received the invoice (it is now Saturday) which was supposed to be sent by email.

Room Service personnel was Great and fast, Food was delicious !
Concierge, doormen and bagagiste very friendly always said hello with a smile very helpful!  One receptionist (PM shift) Asian lady with glasses was very accommodating and made up for the way the rest of her team acted.
Negative_reviews:
I also work at the reception in the Radisson Group and was very disappointed with the way the reception welcomed us. Not once did anyone smile and when I we checked in We were given no information whatsoever about breakfast times, the different hotel facilities or check out time. We stayed in a superior twin room, I don’t understand the difference from a standard room given that there is nothing complimentary that you get from those Rooms.(what makes it superior?)
Housekeeping was rude , said hi to her several times never responded. Shower and mirror were dirty and we had a short circuit because of the iron.
The staff made up for all the other stuff.
Title: Good but not great

Title: excellent

Positive_reviews: The location was amazing. I was in a river view room and was not hopeful about the view being as good as the pictures online. However the view was absolutely amazing, I could see Parliament and Westminster Abbey, Lambeth Bridge, and peeks of the London Eye! The hotel is right next to bus stops making it easy to get to from Waterloo and Vauxhaull without any bother. The staff are very polite and accommodating, and there was lots of staff around who were happy to answer questions and offer assistance. I don't get to stay in nice hotels very often so this was a delightful treat.
Negative_reviews: Unfortunately they got my room service wrong twice. However the food I was given was very good, so I did not raise it as an issue at the time and I do not believe it was inconvenience enough to mark down my score. The breakfast is definitely overpriced for what you get but is in line with other 4* hotels in London.

Title: Pleasurable

Positive_reviews: The hotel was lovely, the staff were very attentive and we felt that we were taken care of.  The bed was extremely comfortable and we had a great night's sleep.  The food was very good too - we ate in the restaurant and thoroughly enjoyed our meal.
Negative_reviews: There was no place to drop off outside the hotel which made things difficult as I am disabled.  Parking was 10 mins walk away at the Novotel. I had asked for an accessible room and this was confirmed by Booking.com but when I arrived there were no accessible rooms available. The check-in staff were very apologetic and upgraded us to a junior suite so that we had more room, which we appreciated although it still obviously lacked the grab rails and extra touches that would have made me feel safer especially in the bathroom. There were long queues at breakfast and the food could have been warmer but staff worked hard to get the queues down as quickly as they could.

Bathroom wasn't as clean as expected for the price. Didn't look like it was vacuumed when we arrived (hairs on the ground and such). 
Personnel was great except for some people in the restaurant during breakfast. One especially stood out. She seated us and gave the breakfast instructions with a straight face and flat tone.
Breakfast itself was OK, but for the price I'd go for breakfast elsewhere.

Title: Excellent

Negative_reviews: Plug in shower pulled out and in the morning the water sitting in the drain was a bit smelly. Shower could have been better. Only one bottle of shampoo, conditioner and body lotion supplied for a two person stay. No biscuits for tea/coffee.
Title: Nice quality hotel with good rooms.

Positive_reviews: Space ship styling of the hotel was not as expected! Spa and pool looked lovely but I had not used. Good entrance area to load and unload. Staff are fantastic! Welcoming staff. Nice views of the River and close to nearly any transport needed. I would try to use the clippers from here next time!
Negative_reviews: We had arrived at the hotel, but the room was not ready so we left and then returned a couple of hours later to check in.  The hotel did allow us to leave our bags which was helpful.  I have been a little disappointed as once we were in our room as the chambermaid came to see if the room was clean, which I would expect to have been completed prior to being given the key.  I then checked the room myself and found there to be rubbish in the bin, the bed appeared to be remade not freshly made and the bathroom was not new guest ready either. I did speak to the hotel reception who without hesitation changed out room for another clean room with the same views, no quibble which was great service.

Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: The rooms are very modern, spacious and comfortable, packed with technology which I loved! The door staff are very welcoming and helpful. Great location - not too close to the centre with all the noise but within walking distance or short tube ride to the main attractions.
Negative_reviews: We arrived early for check in and thought we would see if our rooms were ready yet. We were advised that if we wanted the two rooms on the same floor then only one room was ready but we were welcome to use that room to drop our bags and return at the regular check in time to get the keys for the second room which we were happy to do as we wanted rooms on the same floor. We returned 45 mins after the regular check in time to be given keys to a room on a different floor so we queried this with the member of staff who seemed a little confused and spoke to the other girl who we had dealt with earlier on the afternoon. We stood there while the girl tried making some phone calls but appeared to get no answer, she advised us that the second room was still not ready and asked us to wait as she walked off which we assumed was to go and check the room. 10-15 mins later she returned and handed us a key without much of an apology for our wait or an explanation.  Air con/ heating in the rooms is a little noisy which didn’t really bother me but may be a little annoying for light sleepers. Also you could only access the mini fridge if you left your card details at reception which is a little annoying if you just wanted to add your own drinks to the fridge to keep them chilled.
Title: Hotel is modern with a perfect location for sightseeing.

Positive_reviews: Nice comfortable bed. Good breakfast. Nice view from the bar/restaurant area.
Negative_reviews:
They did not warn at the reception that there would be a fire drill. I found it very rude as the alarm went off while I was in the bath... 
Two hair in the bathtub. The room felt dusty. View on other rooms although I had booked a superior room.
Title: Decent hotel.

Positive_reviews: The room was lovely and the bathroom was huge with a bath and shower. The hotel is tastefully decorated and the staff were friendly
Negative_reviews: We had no view. The large window looked straight on to another apartment. I know some of the rooms have great views
Title: Lovely hotel and it was great value as a late booking

Positive_reviews: I was looking for a good hotel for an affordable price in London very carefully, reading all the reviews. It was really important for me to have a good hotel and luckily I found this hotel. I saw some bad reviews too, but I had a positive impression after all. I was really hoping that this hotel would meet my expectations and it did! I didn’t regret my choice even for a second! Staff was very friendly and they helped us to fix all of our issues promptly.
Negative_reviews:
The sink got clogged, but this issue was fixed very fast, the room wasn’t cleaned that day for some reason, but they sent us a written apology.What didn’t like at all was that we couldn’t use the mini fridge to put our food in there, it was locked, and I couldn’t buy my fave cheese. 
Also, we asked for two separate beds, but they were place very close to each other so they basically were one bed. However hotel personnel came and put two beds separately.
But those are small issues, the stay was brilliant overall!
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: The hotel was amazing, staff very friendly and helpful. Lots of facilities. Location couldn’t be better
Title: Exceptional

Negative_reviews: Bar staff were rather less friendly than other staff  at the check in desk
Title: Perfect location - friendly staff

Positive_reviews: Amazing stay. Rooms were very luxurious and clean and comfy. Air conditioned with high tech lighting and TV systems. Staff were extremely friendly and accommodating. Pool and steam/sauna were clean again staff were very pleasant. Would recommend this to my friends and defo stay here again when I come back to visit London!

Positive_reviews: Very modern hotel with excellent facilities and location.
Negative_reviews:
Everything with the actual hotel and location was perfect however on arrival we were met at the hotel reception by a very rude receptionist.
We were very confused whilst checking in and instead of making this more clear by politely explaining the safety deposit and how much was due etc, the manager just aggressively shouted that we have not paid and we must pay now.
Not the best customer service skills especially when we were being served initially by a trainee receptionist - what type of example is this showing her? 
Apart from this our stay was really pleasant.
Title: Great hotel, rude receptionist.

Positive_reviews: good location, great breakfast eggs cooked to order and great poached eggs
Negative_reviews: in bedroom lamps look like they have been removed and replaced with a circular piece of plastic in the headboard and white tape in bathroom holding above sink unit
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: The room was large and well equipped - proper hair dryer rather than a small one on the wall
Negative_reviews: We were not told at any point that you needed to book the pool and it was not mentioned on the info on the TV.
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: Most of the staff were amazing and helpful.
Negative_reviews: We asked for a twin share however on arrival beds were together and there was furniture in the way so I tried to ring reception about it. Rang a number of times and no one picked up. So had to go down. They assured me someone would be straight up. 3 hours later still no one had come. This happened two more times and no one ever picked up the call from the room, so each time had to go down  before the room ladies would arrive who had told reception they had done it. When they arrived they made a comment and gave us a look like we could have done it ourselves even though beds were heavy and there was other furniture to move out the way, and we had been told not to do it ourselves. This part of stay wasted time and was a poor start and meant we couldnt relax . The Safe also didn’t work so had to get maintenance. Then was delivered a report from someone after 9pm acknowledging our complaint but it was not our complaint  so must have been a mix up with another room. The girls on front counter were excellent trying to sort the issue however the room cleaning staff I felt were not listening to them. We were compensated for the mess up.
Title: Lovely facilities and rooms and very handy.

Positive_reviews: Crossients were great. Loved dinner with live music. Steak on rocks were one of the best we have tasted. Loved the room and the views! We were celebrating our 15th wedding anniversary and the staff went above and beyond to make it a special evening!
Negative_reviews:
Breakfast was very busy and not that relaxing.  
Expected complimentary mineral water in our  room
Title: A stylish and relaxing break

Positive_reviews: Staff were exceptional and could t do enough for my dad who was in a wheelchair
Negative_reviews: Hotel is very dark inside, took a while to find our way around

Very comfortable beds.

 The room service is very poor. 45 mins wait for 2 drinks and mini bar wouldn’t open so again another wait for someone to attend the room.

As they weren't essential this just led to our amusement rather than disappointment and didn't feel the need to raise the issue again.

Title: Good

Positive_reviews:
This is the first time I've stopped over at Park Plaza, the hotel is fantastically located and close to the tube line. The hotel itself is exceptional with its quality & design throughout.
The staff are very professional & welcoming
I will certainly be using this again & would recommend to friends & family.
Negative_reviews: No complaints
Title: Great hotel, excellent staff well worth a stay.

Positive_reviews: The shower was incredible...when we had hot water.
Negative_reviews: We were a group of four ladies, two per room. We booked two twin rooms; upon check in was told we had one twin and one double executive. No big deal, the front desk lady made the change easy. When each pair went to their rooms everything was great until we met up back in the lobby. Room 2 ladies (room 405, I was in room 432) said their bellman Roman or something like that gave them a quick overview of the room; he showed them how to use the remote panel, gave them extra bottled water and ordered two robes and slippers. Our bellman guy did nothing like that and never mentioned that we shouldn’t drink the hotel faucet water. Room 405 was nice and cool; 432 was always hot even with the AC set to the lowest level. The other person in my room had a cold shower, even though she was the first to shower. My shower, about 30 mins later, was nice and hot. Wish the consistency in service was across the board.
Title: Beautiful hotel, comfy beds, amazing shower and good location.

Positive_reviews: The beds and linen and extremely comfortable, feels very luxurious. The staff are very friendly both the rooms and communal areas are clean and tidy. Didn’t try the pool or the gym. It was my partner’s birthday and they left a happy birthday balloon in the bedroom it’s those extra touches that make the experience 100 times better. Overall very happy with the location and service received.  The view was lovely too!!
Negative_reviews: Nothing. Couldn’t fault it.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews:
The property was clean and the bed was one of the most comfortable I’ve ever slept in. 
The were amazing; always willing to help with a genuine smile: special mention to Shanilla at the reception, she is a credit to Park Plaza!
Negative_reviews: Everything was perfect!
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Breakfast was perfect. Personnel was very helpful especially since the first two rooms they offered me were not satisfactory.  They went out of their way to find me a suitable room. All in all, the hotel is lovely, the fitness studio was ample, and the breakfast room was fantastic. The staff wrote me a card to wish me luck for my big event the next day and I was very thankful.
Negative_reviews: The first room I was offered had super low ceilings and the bathroom was not really clean, the second had no openable window and the furniture was also not clean. The third, was lovely, the only drawback being that there was no single electrical outlet in the bathroom where there was a mirror, nor was there any outlet in front of any mirror in the whole room. Only one side of the bed offered an electrical outlet. The heat on that level of the hotel was not controllable in the rooms because it was older and offered one setting for the whole floor. They gave me a small space heater though which helped, and I was able to open the window in that room.  Windows provided decent sound proofing as well.

Receptionist seemed to view this as our mistake for not spotting the signs and didn’t seem to be listening to what I was saying.  Not too comforting when you’ve woken up  by the fire alarm and people shouting and banging on doors.

We requested another room and were shown an 'upgraded room' (same size as previous room but on higher floor) for an extra 30 pounds/night.  Because of the noise and our complaints we were eventually given another room on a quieter floor.

Title: Poor

Title: Rooms too hot, unhelpful staff

Positive_reviews: Staff were friendly.
Negative_reviews:
The room was like a sauna despite the aircon being set at the lowest temperature all it did was leave me with a dry throat.
Half of the toilet flush was missing, the shower attachments were hanging off the wall.
The breakfast was average and the coffee poor even when taken directly from the machine.
The Raddison Rewards programme only lets you accrue points on bookings made directly with the hotel. This was not explained to me prior to my last 3 bookings - made via this website.
Title: Expensive and average. Better at the Premier Inn.

Positive_reviews: Very friendly and professional reception staff. Swimming pool was nice which was main reason for booking. Steam room and sauna too, although starting to look a bit tired in places.
Negative_reviews:
We dont stay away often so this was supposed to be a treat. However a few things spoiled the experience. Grumpy bar man in the evening, who really acted like he didn't want to be there. Rubbish night sleep due to paper thin walls and noisy neighbour's. Loud music and we could  everything! Calling reception took a while but when they did eventually answer they did act promptly to try and resolve the situation. 
Although breakfast was lavish, there are not enough tables so you have to queue to get in. And when we were seated we were not given the spiel  on how it all worked but we noticed others were, which made us feel a bit unworthy. Appreciate it was busy but thats all part of the job.
Title: Great Location, disappointing stay

Positive_reviews: I’ll consider next time if I’ll stay in this hotel ,

Positive_reviews:
Nothing.i never going book this hotel in future.
Total waste
