Title: Served its purpose.

Negative_reviews:
Toilet flush does not work in any toilet, it's weird but you will understand when you stay there.
My toilet was blocked for a day and there is not toilet brush to clean it but they provide gloves so you can handle your own poo yourself. Also, fridge is has sensors so every time you pick something up to read or find out what drink or food they are it goes down to your invoice.
Title: Luxury but improvements required, staff needs more smile and professionalism.

Positive_reviews: Location, comfortable bed, polite staff.
Negative_reviews: We were given a room obviously catering for a disabled person, which is obviously very helpful if you are disabled, however for us it meant that many things in the room were at the wrong height. There was NO hot water in the morning (or evening) and the shower floor was dirty. Breakfast was quite good but the plates were extremely small.
Title: Great location for Westminster and tourist attractions but we will not be staying again.

Positive_reviews: Friendly staff
Negative_reviews: Room was really cold, couldn't seem to get the room warm with heating. Room service took a while to get an answer, chicken ceaser salad was awful. Chicken was dryer than the croutons. And the salad was old.

Positive_reviews: Room wore lovely size
Negative_reviews: Steamroom and sauna wore both not working
Title: Steamroom and sauna wore both not working

Positive_reviews: Location was very good
Negative_reviews: This hotel has so much positional but it is simply so unorganized, we had to move room twice before we got the room we book. When we eventually got the correct room the shower did not work along with several more issues. We were offered breakfast as an apology which was shocking! Very disappointed overall!
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Location . The breakfast manager was very good as was one of the duty managers.
Negative_reviews: Room on arrival was not made up but was still allocated to us. Alternate room given but with disability access which we didn’t ask for. Room on the second night was also with disability access and next to the lift. Very noisy. Eventually on the third night got the original room. This was great but too late. We lived out of our suit cases for the weekend. It spoiled our trip to London.
Title: Probably one of the most disappointing hotels that we have stayed in

Negative_reviews: Floors were not clean bathroom needs a good scrub to get the the dirt of the tiles. Felt like I was showering in someone else’s dirt. Dirty foot prints on the bathroom floor. Friendly staff but slow. Short staffed
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Free welcome drink
Negative_reviews: As a Radisson Reward client I had asked for a river view and/or an executive room. I asked if they had my card number.. the reception affirmed they had it. I waited until 15.30 for the “executive room” with a river view... I got room 1037. I went to the room and could see a portion of the river from the right hand corner of the window. I went back to reception and was told if I wanted river view, thenI needed to pay an extra£100+. Needless to say I stayed in room 1037... no gowns nor slippers in the room (the same occurred on one of my previous visits). We usually eat and drink at the Plazas.. not this time! The customer service was poor and I still wonder whether the points were added to my a/c, and whether the room 1037 is the executive room which I was told it was
Title: Very disappointing as prior to the last two visits it has been good

Positive_reviews: The location was convenient
Negative_reviews: Very very dirty room! Disgusting in the bathroom
Title: Poor

Positive_reviews: the staff and bedroom view
Negative_reviews: That I booked a double bed and recieved 2 single beds pushed together
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: The breakfast was outstanding!
Negative_reviews: Tv didn’t work and usb charger port didn’t work also
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: Location and check in staff
Negative_reviews:
Poor customer service at bar and restaurants. This was especially true at breakfast. Where an American guest had her table taken and waiting staff showed little interest in helping her. We offered her to join us. It shouldn't be the responsibility of other guests to make her feel welcome.
I have since returned to Cheltenham to discover I have left a souvenir brochure of the les Miserable  concert we attended last night. I rang to ask if they had found it. On returning my call ten minutes later they asked if I could come to collect it. When I asked if I they could post it to me. They said I would have to e mail and arrange payment for it to be returned. I appreciate that it was my fault for leaving it. But when a customer has paid for room and breakfast. It seems customer satisfaction is not high on this hotels agenda.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: nothing
Negative_reviews: They gave us disabled room when we wanted a romantic evening it was honestly a horrible experience. We were not able to pay at the front desk like we originally requested.
Title: Horrible

Positive_reviews: Good location
Negative_reviews: Rooms far too warm token aircon facilities
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Staff at the check-out.
Negative_reviews: Air-conditioning.
Title: Air-conditioning in this hotel is a joke!

Positive_reviews: The location
Negative_reviews: The service in general
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews:
Look impressive 
Very nice welcome
Negative_reviews:
Lack of information given on arrival
Also no information in the rooms for everything in the hotel
Pool was tiny
To get anywhere from my room seemed as if I had to walk from floor to floor to get the correct lift to get where I wanted to go (hard work with a 6year old)
Breakfast cold everyday 
Sofa bed for child was awful and uncomfortable
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Swimming pool was ok although small
Negative_reviews: Overpriced and breakfast not worth the extra cost
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: not a lot,  more issues I will be taking up directly with the hotel
Negative_reviews: had to ask for cereal bowls told to look on the other serving station!, none available there either. The cooked breakfast was cold, coffee machine ran out of coffee and milk.
Title: most things about this hotel were okay big let down with the breakfast for the price we paid.

Positive_reviews:
The shower was good and spacious; the bed and pillows were comfortable. Bathrobes and slippers appreciated.
The room was a good size and well-appointed. The room and upper corridor decoration was much more appealing than that in the lobby and entrance.
Negative_reviews:
A general inadequate level of service and unfriendly, impersonal ambiance, especially upon arrival :
-incompetent, inexperienced reception staff.
-dim, gloomy lobby and reception area and lifts.
- booking requests not adhered to and little effort to accommodate us with better. Initially, instead of a river view, we found ourselves facing a brick wall.
A general lack of maintenance in the room with severe limitations of products: shaving mirror fixture broken, so unusable; bathroom mirror so poorly cleaned we had the impression it was steamed up ; only 1 bath gel and shampoo, i.e. enough for 1 shower for 2 people (we wanted to take a shower in the evening and in the morning, so insufficient supply), idem for tea and coffee, just 2 packets of everything. Everything seemed rationed.
Reception never answered the phone when we tried to reach them.
Title: Unfavorably memorable.

Negative_reviews: The minibar in the room did not work, staff slow to attend and did not follow up
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews:
The room generally and the view was lovely. 
The bar staff were friendly and gave us complimentary milk for our child which was a nice gesture. 
The location fitted well with our weekend  itinerary.
Negative_reviews:
We had confirmation of the sofa bed being made up for our young son which it was not on arrival. We were told it would be sorted when we raised it at 10am. It was still not sorted at 7.30pm when we came back after a full day out. Guest services could not tell me when it would be arranged yet we had to put out child to sleep. Only on a personal visit to reception did they then, 30 mins later, sort the bed. General service was therefore poor. 
On check out, nothing was mentioned, no apology, no question of how the stay was and apparently the inability to print a receipt! 
No biscuits with tea and coffee and an empty bottle of wine left in the room. Disappointed for the amount we paid and for a 4 star hotel. Clear that staff dont communicate from one shift to the next.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Location
Negative_reviews: Some employees did not treat me well
Title: Never stay here again

Positive_reviews: View
Negative_reviews: The hotel is THE MOST DISCUSTING place I have ever stayed in my life! DO NOT STAY there if you don't want to 1) see catch up on your pillow 2) have left over cheese from the previous guests in your friend 3) find a dirty sock in your drawer 4) find HAIR all over your supposedly fresh BED SHEETS 5) wardrobe that smells like smelly sock 6) stained toilet seat 7) COMPLAIN about the above to the hotel staff, promised to a better room, only to find dirty bedsheet and dirty toilet seat again, repeat the some experience twice, and eventually gave up because you are too tired of the long haul flight.
Title: The hotel is THE MOST DISCUSTING place I have ever stayed in my life! DO NOT STAY there

Positive_reviews: Location is pretty central, almost directly across Westminster - but there is not much around the hotel in terms of food, entertainment - its pretty quiet and dead... especially for London standards. The hotel is clean, and the bed is comfortable.
Negative_reviews: I was on the 5th floor, looking directly into the living space of an apt right across the alley. The room was dark, the decor felt "dated", especially the lighting and  the carpets! The elevator beeped right into the room every time someone called it...    the hotel check in took a long time - it is a very very busy hotel!
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Good location and the staff was very friendly
Negative_reviews: The heat in our room did not work so we spent the last night in London freezing. Secondly the shower was growing mold in the grout. The cleaning staff didn’t really clean. The bed looked like it was made by my 7yr old niece.
Title: Expected better for the price

Positive_reviews: Hotel seemed like a nice hotel, my room was not awesome at all. Low floor, and interior facing an air shaft. My colleague had a high floor in a newly renovated room.
Negative_reviews: My room was dated and busted, it was dark because it was on the interior. I am a Starwood guy and just used to a better experience.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: Location
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Location and comfort of the beds. Also.. it was very quiet so got a good nights sleep.
Negative_reviews: The cleanliness in each of the three rooms that I stayed in on this trip was appalling. Toes nails on bathroom floors, previous guests t-shirt left in cupboard, loose crisps lying in drawers. Floor not hoovered, sticky surfaces, balloons from previous guests hanging round the lamps, filthy teaspoons and cups. Also, I got my poached eggs 20 minutes after the friend got hers. They yolks were solid. They brought me new  eggs but this time there was a hair on my plate. Staff at reception moved us to a second and then a third  room but I have no confidence that anything was going to be done about our complaints in terms of feedback  to those that could improve in the future.
Title: Disappointing

Negative_reviews: Did unfortunately not meet our expectations. We had a family room, however the extra bed was made for one person only, although we had booked for two kids. We had to notify the reception twice before they finally came with extra bedsheets for the second night. Air condition was leaking water down to the carpet on the floor, we got wet every time we accidentally stepped into it. Nothing was done to fix this during our stay. Lack of info at check-in: no info about wifi, breakfast time, checkout time - we thought we would find this info in the room or on the keycard folder, but no. At check-in we asked about opening hours for the swimming pool and also if there were specific times for kids to swim. We were not told that we actually had to book a time slot for swimming in advance, this came to our knowledge when we came down to the swimming pool, ready to take bath... Breakfast was chaotic and unorganised. Sorry, all in all we expected more from this hotel.
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: The Beds were very comfortable. Reception & porters very helpful & friendly.
Negative_reviews: The children were very disappointed that the pool was closed. We booked this hotel for that facility.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: I liked the central console for lights, curtains etc.
Negative_reviews:
Admittedly I  booked my room on the day but it wasn’t discounted and was at the going rate, I was not advised that there was a train line directly outside my window and at the same height.  The trains were constant, particularly in the morning and despite double glazing were noisy.  I booked thinking there was parking, which it says on the booking page, however reading the small print after realised they didn’t have parking other than valet parking.
Breakfast was chaos.  The hotel was extremely busy with tourists and there was a queue for breakfast.  I sat at the bar as I was on business but it was bedlam with everyone bumping into each other that I jus5 had toast and a coffee.  It certainly wasn’t relaxing and there was an air of unhappiness in there.
Title: Chaotic hotel with a busy train line at the back

Positive_reviews: Location wasn't  too bad.
Negative_reviews: Had a room with a bath but couldn't  use it because the bath plug wouldn't  seal. The food is overpriced for the tiny portions that you receive, left hungry. Pillows are flat and uncomfortable. Have to pay for tv, movies and local phone calls.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Good location
Negative_reviews: The toilet bowl was cracked. The design of the shower is poor, the glass doors are floor to ceiling. Lack of ventilation has lead to a mouldy ceiling as the steam has nowhere to go. The aircon was dripping onto the carpet in front of bathroom door. We kept the curtains closed as the window looked right into the neighbors. On site food was very expensive for the quality
Title: Good location to get some sleep

Positive_reviews:
. The staff is bad
The housekeeping come tonight into our room when we sleep . 
Doesn’t safe
Title: Poor

Negative_reviews: Check-in process took 30 minutes. Breakfast was average at best (and quite expensive). Room aimed at solo traveller - one teabag, one bottle of water etc.
Title: Just scraped above average. Wasn’t bad but wouldn’t go back in a hurry.

Positive_reviews: The river view is great and the bed is comfortable. Aircon worked well.
Negative_reviews: Service, in particular housekeeping, is not up to standard. They seem to have organizational problems. Our room was not really clean: dusty, breadcrumbs and dirty mugs from previous guests. In addition, everyday something different got forgotten: towels, shampoo, toilet paper or coffee utilities weren't replaced. A promised linen change never happened. I complained during my stay, staff was friendly, but nothing changed. At check-out, they charged double breakfast although we only had booked it for one day. I travel a lot, for work and for leisure - I haven't been so dissatisfied with a 4 star hotel in a long time.
Title: Lack of housekeeping and service-orientation

Positive_reviews: Location
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: The design
Negative_reviews: Some of the furniture is showing it’s age now
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: The hotel is really nice especially the room which was spacious and high tech. The free wifi was good and location is convenient especially if you like to walk to Westminster, the London EYE and Borough Market environs. The staff at check in/out were wonderful especially Jeffrey who went out of his way to provide an excellent service.
Negative_reviews: I did not like the fact that the shower had mould in the grouting. It was a bit of a let down for the rest of the room. What I did not like even more is the restaurant staff. They seem to be more interested in doing their job rather than serving customers. I spend a lot of time choosing items from the menu at the restaurant which I dined at and after clearly explaining to the waiter that I had a restricted diet, he failed to point out that two of the dishes I ordered had the ingredients I was trying to avoid. I returned one dish and tailored the other to my requirements by removing the unwanted batter from the fried fish. I wish he paid more attention and recommended other dishes which are more suitable. During breakfast, I did not like the limited dishes. They could do with more fruit and vegetables and a less micro managing Manager. I felt sorry for the staff working there. The same could be said about housekeeping. I had a late check out and the privacy sign outside my room switched on but housekeeping barged in without knocking before I was due to leave the room and practically kicked me out!
Title: Good hotel. Shame about the restaurant and housekeeping staff!

Negative_reviews: Room was very small and right next to the lifts so noisy. Plumbing was also very noisy - every time you turned the tap on made a horrendous noise and the pipes made a racket all night. Would definitely not recommend to ANYONE.
Title: Very disappointing, over-priced for what you get, poor facilities.

Positive_reviews: Size of bed was brilliant and the view
Negative_reviews:
Did not replenish teabags
Only 2 lifts for 17 floors. Paid extra for view so high up but at times could take 10mins waiting for lift. 17 flights of stairs not an option. Staff were quite blunt.
Title: Great view but not sure worth 200 a night.

Positive_reviews: Location
Negative_reviews: Something didn't feel right at soon as we got to the suite.  Staff entered our room on 2 occasions using a master key card and were surprised to see us there. It felt very 'Fawlty Towers".  Staff generally felt very disjointed.  Breakfast staff rude.  Housekeeping lacked.  Glass tops stained and dirty, floors dusty, beds made but only just.
Title: Not the best experience.  Probably would not return.

Positive_reviews: location
Negative_reviews: hotel was too dark, we felt like we were staying in a night club.  Room service staff were anything but professional or friendly.
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Dinner in the evening was very good
Negative_reviews: Very expensive £30+ for two cocktails, said would be upgraded but was moved to a disabled room, bed was hard
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: Everything
Negative_reviews: People who worked
Title: Very Poor

Positive_reviews: Room was nice
Negative_reviews: Room wasn’t ready when we arrived.had to wait a fair amount of time- this is after check in time.  Rooms were on separate floor to other family members etc
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Breakfast OK. Good Variety.
Negative_reviews:
1. Took more than 6 hours to replace to blown reading light despite written notes passed to front desk. Need second call to housekeeping.
2. Stains in water kettle.
3. Fridge not cleaned out. Leftover food remains.
4. Frontdesk staff under-trained and not helpful though the two duty managers were proactive in tackling the issues.
Title: Good location. Staff need training.

Positive_reviews: Good location, with a nice bar, restaurant and pool/spa facilities. decent sized bedrooms and bathrooms.
Negative_reviews: Staff charged me twice on a pervious visit. When I pointed this out on this, return, visit, there was no apology, which indicated poor training. the breakfast is a crush between 7am - 9am. Too space a space for that many people.
Title: Fine for a corporate, bland but well located stay

Negative_reviews: The bathroom smelt of stale cigarette smoke, the room had no widow and the kettle was missing.  Also the corridor outside my room smelt of the chlorine from the indoor pool.  On top of that I couldn't get a receipt at checkout as the system wasn't working and I never did get the email copy as promised by the counter staff.
Title: Worse than expected.

Positive_reviews: The hotel has Alot of gadgets if you like that sort of thing. TV was such a nightmare to work that eventually I didn't bother.
Negative_reviews: Breakfast, it isn't worth the money. Overcrowded and luke warm food, coffee (unless you go machine for it) no real vegetarian /vegan options
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Views from the room were great.
Negative_reviews: The first suite we were given had workmen still in it. After some time waiting for another suite we were given a very old room which was filthy and which we also refused to stay in. The third suite was significantly better (higher floor) but still had not been cleaned properly. The room - like all the corridors - had not been hoovered or cleared of rubbish and last nights room service trays. I have never been to a hotel that was this dirty EVERYWHERE. We refused to eat here as we wouldn't have trusted the restaurant to be any cleaner.
Title: Nice hotel - needs a thorough clean!

Positive_reviews:
Location on the river . 
Good Lobby service
Negative_reviews: House keeping needs improvement. Bathroom is dirty , same as rooms. No slippers . Bell boys should be more helpful with luggage.
Title: over rated

Negative_reviews:
Steam room was dirty
Breakfast on the first morning was cold, the second morning we had really hard boiled eggs.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Staff were very friendly, and the doorman was great.
Negative_reviews: The bathroom wasn’t clean, the shower didn’t work well and the fittings were shabby.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: Place was very clean.  And very courteous and helpful staff!
Negative_reviews: I felt for the price of the room, and the fact that it was tough for transport via the train system... more should have been offered from a food/amenity standpoint. I also did not have a hair dryer in my room. I had to wait an hour for it, and almost missed an appointment because of it.  Also breakfast was way too pricey, with little other food options in the area.
Title: It could have been better.

Positive_reviews: The view
Negative_reviews: Rude staff
Title: Very Poor

Positive_reviews: Hotel is ok but super rude service!
Title: Fair

Negative_reviews: There was a fire alarm in the early hours of the morning and we had to evacuate the building. The fire doors were locked and we couldn’t get out. We had to go back up the stairs and out through the bar. Thank fully it was a false alarm but the situation would have been much more serious if there had been a fire. This was a serious breach of fire safety regulations. The evacuation was also not handled well by the staff. I have put in a complaint about this.
Title: Good until the fire evacuation which breached regulations.

Positive_reviews: Interesting decor, lively atmosphere
Negative_reviews:
Was confusing as there’s another hotel sharing the same foyer. Was checked into the wrong room, called down to reception and they insisted I was in a twin room (I was looking at a double bed) after convincing them I was not making it up, they said they would send a staff member up to provide a new room key. Nobody turned up. I had to call twice more and after twenty minutes went back down to reception so so could actually have their attention and some customer service. On trying to get back downstairs, multiple lifts were out of order.
Eventually made it to the room we had actually booked. Really irritating experience.
Title: Dissatisfying

Positive_reviews: Excellent, fast check in
Negative_reviews: Slow process to get into breakfast and restaurant staff had to be reminded twice to get my bill. Shame as breakfast itself good.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Nice breakfast.
Negative_reviews: The room was a bit fusty.  Control for lights, air con, curtains etc over complicated and insensitive.  Had to sit at bar for breakfast.
Title: Expensive.  Foyer grand, but rooms not so much.

Negative_reviews: For starters my room wasn’t the one advertised in the photos, secondly once I arrived I was told my room wouldn’t be ready for another hour even though I arrived at 3pm. I was shorty told after that my room now wouldn’t have a bath as shown in advertisements. Once i finally got into my room the temperature was appalling, it was freezing the whole time and wasn’t able to fix it even after multiple complaints. I was then told a heater would be delivered so I waited 2 hours until I was told they don’t have that either even after offering.
Title: Poor

Positive_reviews: Modern
Negative_reviews: Not clean
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Breakfast was nice.
Negative_reviews: Our room was very close to the next corridor which were doing works started very early in the morning couldnt even sleep due to the drilling and banging sounds.  Air conditioner was only blowing cold air not hot air. Our robes had a few strips of female hair which made us wonder if they were there from previous people which stayed, didnt ask for new ones as we dont use them anyway. Just not what we expected from a top class looking hotel. On our check out we did mention this to one of the staff members however nothing was done.
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: breakfast
Negative_reviews: no sauna or steam room as adverstised - both out of order. reservation hadnt been sent so had to wait 35 minutes to check in. £432 has been taken from my bank account - looks like 2 bookings taken. no extra bed in room. bathroom fan wouldnt turn off wa on all night - didnt get much sleep
Title: very poor- and charged twice, adverstised facilities out of order

Negative_reviews: Accommodation was overall okay but there was a fire alarm at 7am in the room for a reason the manager could not explain! It ruined our day honnestly!
Title: Very Poor

Positive_reviews: Room was nice and quiet. The air con worked well and wasn't noisy.  Rooms and public areas were clean.
Negative_reviews: Room controls were very bright and not all dimmed when not in use. Bathroom basic for a 4 star hotel. Had to revisit reception when we were unable to charge drinks back to our room despite having our card swiped.
Title: Fine, ok location, no real problems but was expecting more for a 4 star hotel

Negative_reviews: Lazy room service. No soap and shower cap from the second day.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: Comfortable bed, room was well-equipped, food and drinks in restaurant were good (if a bit pricey).
Negative_reviews: I was double-charged AND a hold put on my account for the room, which resulted in my cc being maxed out when traveling for business. I PRE-PAID for the ENTIRE cost of the room before arriving, but was made to pay the entire bill again (instead of just the food charges incurred) when checking out. I tried to explain i had paid already when my assistant booked the room, but front desk staff was insistent and I needed to get into the office for an early meeting. Upon further investigation later with my bank, it appears the hotel ALSO put a full-value hold on my cc for the room, in spite of the fact that i paid in advance AND then paid at the end. I vacated the room on 30 Aug and there was a hold STILL on my account (after 2 payments to them) on 4 Sept. Whether it was due to incompetence or maliciousness, i don't know, but i don't really care. My ability to function financially in the city on business this week has been severely impacted by the Park Plaza Riverbank and their inability to prevent, proactively fix, or even try to make right the theft of my money is disgusting. I will won't be risking my finances to stay here again and you can be sure I will warn colleagues of the questionable financial practices.
Title: Nice place, inappropriate billing practices charge you 2-3x what is owed, and it is on you to fix

Positive_reviews: The mood lighting
Negative_reviews: Breakfast was poor in choice & quality, also during breakfast We left our hot beverages to get some food and they were clearing the table! We had only been there ten minutes if that and were taking almost full drinks away as if we had finished?! There was no water in the rooms, one biscuit to share between 2 people. The taps in the bathroom had seen better days, and checking in was a nightmare. The room we had originally booked was not available as if it was my fault they were showing a minus on rooms?! Worst thing is that we paid in advance.
Title: I won’t be staying here again.

Positive_reviews: Not much, location fine
Negative_reviews: Room clearly needed some work - ceiling peeling in shower,  toilet was dirty, carpets were damp and wet in some places. The whole floor had buildings works and was messy
Title: Typical big hotel, glossy downstairs, room crappy

Negative_reviews: House keeping n cleanliness was poor
